[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
After that, we had the same exchange at the supermarket. It was so awkward I couldn't go to that shopping district for a while.

…Well, if you say it's because cats are cute...

[Vanilla]: "Hm? Hmph, hmpf..."

[Vanilla]: "There's a really nice smell coming from over there."

[Chocola]: "It's true! It smells so fragrant and good, Master!"

[Kashou]: "Indeed. This scent is…"

He turns his face towards the source of the smell.

[Street Cat Vendor]: "Welcome, welcome!"

[Street Cat Vendor]: "How about some freshly made takoyaki? How about it?"

[Street Cat Vendor]: "Hot, hot, full of katsuobushi takoyaki! How about it?"

[Chocola]: "Wow, a cat takoyaki stand! That's rare, Master!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: "So you can be a good girl!"
[Vanilla]: "Shigure, you're strict. But thanks to you, I've learned a lot."
[Owner]: "Is that so? You have a wonderful Master then."
[Chocola]: "Ah, but *Master* is *Master*!"  
[Chocola]: "Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, *Master*?"  
[Vanilla]: "In translation, Shigure is my important friend."  
[Vanilla]: "So I'm only calling you Master."  
[Owner]: "Ahaha. So your Master is loved, huh?"  
[Kashou]: "Well, thankfully."  
(Elbow lightly nudged.)  
He returns the response with a slightly embarrassed and wry smile.  
…It's a bit embarrassing outside, though.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのごはんはいつでもおいしーですにゃー♪」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、ほっぺにケチャップ付いてる」
[バニラ]: 「芸術的にかわいい。舐めてあげちゃう。ぺろぺろ」
当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
Staring at the merciless electronic sound of a ringing cell phone.  
…Thought if I could just contact Shigure, it would be solved immediately.  

**Chocola:** "Muu, ngungungun, breakfast is so yummy!"  
**Chocola:** "Master's food is always so yummy~♪"  
**Vanilla:** "Chocola, you have ketchup on your cheek."  
**Vanilla:** "Artistically cute. I'll lick it off for you. *licks*."  

The actual owners are happily stuffing their faces with sandwiches.  
By the way, the fillings are tomato, cheese, and lettuce.  
Plus a half-cooked egg sandwiched in between—pretty simple.  
Breakfast is what it is.  

**Kashou:** "You guys, you're finally coming home today, right?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
SPEAKER_NAME: "With a clear, cheerful smile, I hand over the invoice and pen."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Yes, um..."  
I re-examine the invoice I've just received.  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "...Um, it seems like what I ordered is different from this."  
[Tableware Supplier]: "...Eh? Really?"  
[Tableware Supplier]: "Does that mean...the items are incorrect?"  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "No, the things I requested seem to be included here..."  
My gaze drifts toward the mountain of cardboard boxes stacked inside.  
A sea of cardboard mountains in this small shop. More accurately, the store is almost entirely made of cardboard.  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "As you can see, we don't need so many dishes at our place..."  
[Tableware Supplier]: "S-Sorry! I'll immediately check with headquarters!"  
[Tableware Supplier]: "Would it be alright if I waited a moment?!"  

*(doki doki)*

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
**食器業者:** "It seems there was an error on our end, and your order got mixed with another one..."  
**食器業者:** "I'm sure you'll need it soon, Mr. Minaduki..."  
**食器業者:** "If possible, could I have you take the ordered dishes now?"  

**嘉祥:** "Take my order...?"  
**嘉祥:** "...Huh? From *this* pile?"  

A towering mountain of cardboard boxes looms before him.  
He stammers, at a loss for words.  
Every box looks identical.  
You don't know what's inside until you open it.  
And the invoices confirm they're all top-tier tea sets and fine china—so handling them requires extreme care or disaster strikes.  

**嘉祥:** "Um, I understand we need to get ready for opening today too..."  
**嘉祥:** "...To unpack *all* of this now? That'll take ages."

Question:

この量じゃ軽く見ても２時間はかかるだろうし……。
かと言って再配達してもらっても二度手間だし……。
[嘉祥]: 「…………ん？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「じー」
[嘉祥]: 「ネコの手があったーっ！！」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「にゃにゃっ！？　にゃんですかぁっ！？」
[食器業者]: 「ネコちゃんたち、本当に助かりました！」
[食器業者]: 「ありがとうございます、ほんとにありがとうございます！」
[食器業者]: 「では私はこれで失礼させて頂きますね！」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ、無駄に疲れた……」
仕分け終わった食器を横目に、
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「I have to make it to my next delivery, after all...!」
[Kashou]: 「Look, you don't need to put all this pressure on me...」
From looks of it, it would take two hours or more...
But to have it redelivered would take double the effort, too...
[Kashou]: 「...... Hmm?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Stare.」
[Kashou]: 「That's right, I have a lifeline!!」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Meow meow?! What is it?!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「You've really saved me, catgirls!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Thank you! Thank you oh so very much!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Well then, I'll be on my way!」
[Kashou]: 「... Haah, I'm exhausted...」
I glanced at the tableware we had finished organizing...
ModelAnswer:
**[Dish Supplier]: "I have to go deliver the next shipment too...!"**  
**[Kashou]: "Ugh, you're putting so much pressure on me..."**  
At this rate, it'll take at least two hours even if I'm lightening my load… But having them redeliver would be a pain in the neck.  

**[Kashou]: "...Huh?"**  
**[Chocola & Vanilla]: "Meow~"**  
**[Kashou]: "A cat's paw saved me!!"**  
**[Chocola & Vanilla]: "Mew!?! Mew?!"**  

**[Dish Supplier]: "The kittens really helped out!"**  
**[Dish Supplier]: "Thank you so much, thank you very much!"**  
**[Dish Supplier]: "Well then, I'll be going now!"**  
**[Kashou]: "...Sigh, this is pointless exhaustion..."**  

Ignoring the dishes he just sorted, Kashou slumped.

[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
**嘉祥:** "…If I could just live as simply as a cat, things would be easier."  
He glanced at the shop name on the window.  
Shaking off a wry smile, he began putting away the newly delivered teacups.  

**バニラ:** "Hey, that takoyaki stand isn't here today."  
The same evening park street as yesterday.  
But there weren’t any stalls in sight today.  
Even trying to send the cats back home was impossible since no one was around.  
I’d even left my house key at my parents’ place.  

**ショコラ:** "...Huh? Oh, I’m sorry, Vanilla!"  
**ショコラ:** "What was it again? Something like matatabi?"  
**バニラ:** "Something like that."

metadata:
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、疲れたなら少し休んでくか？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、はい、少しだけ……」
[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」
[バニラ]: 「じゃあ私、何か飲み物買ってくる」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。全員分な」
[バニラ]: 「了解。任された」
バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Chocola, if you're tired, why don't you rest for a bit?"  
[Chocola]: "Ah, yes... just a little..."  
[Chocola]: "But I'm fine. Sorry to worry you, Master."  
[Kashou]: "...It's nothing to apologize for."  
He lowers his head with a troubled smile.  
I know the reason she’s not feeling well.  
So there’s no point in saying anything.  
[Kashou]: "Well, there’s a bench right there. Why don’t you rest?"  
[Vanilla]: "Then I’ll go get some drinks."  
[Kashou]: "Ah, thanks. For everyone."  
[Vanilla]: "Roger that. Leave it to me."  
She hands Chocola some change and urges her toward the bench.  
The refreshing sea breeze rustles the trees in the park.

行く先がちょっとだけ不安になりながらも。
二匹の頭を愛情を込めてくしゃくしゃと撫でつける。
[嘉祥]: 「よし、じゃあ商店街に戻るか」
[ショコラ]: 「へ？　何でですか？　お買い物はもう終わったんですよね？」

[バニラ]: 「おぉーご主人、カッコいい」
[バニラ]: 「ついでに松坂ウシも買おう」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「From here on out, we need to do our best all together.」
[Chocola]: 「Of course! ♪ Chocola is all right even if we don't have fatty tuna for dinner every night! Just occasionally is good enough!」
[Vanilla]: 「For meat, A4 grade is fine as long as it's Matsuzaka beef. Fatty meat is the best!」
[Kashou]: 「... Is that all you guys have been eating at home?!」
Even if the road ahead of us is uncertain...
I lovingly rubbed their heads, disheveling their hair.
[Kashou]: 「All right, why don't we head back to the shopping district then?」
[Chocola]: 「Eh? Why is that? Aren't you done with shopping already?」
[Kashou]: 「We have to go buy that shampoo you guys liked, don't we?」
[Vanilla]: 「Ohhh~ Master is so cool!」
[Vanilla]: 「While we're at it, let's buy some Matsuzaka beef.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kaishou]: "I gotta do my best from now on. Together."  
[Shokora]: "Yes!~♪ It's okay if it's not big toro every night, right? Sometimes is fine!"  
[Banira]: "A4 grade meat is enough for me. If it’s Matsusaka beef, the marbling is perfect."  
[Kaishou]: "...So you guys were eating that stuff all the time back at your place?"

[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
**嘉祥:** "Thanks to Shigure, the customers have been coming in more than we expected."  
**時雨:** "Oh? What do you mean?"  
I decided not to push it further.  
Shigure tilted her head and chuckled softly as she replied. If she wanted to say something, she would just tell me directly. That was always Shigure for you.  

**時雨:** "I understand what you're saying."  
**時雨:** "But cats are smart creatures. They can be family to humans, partners too."  
**時雨:** "...That's why..."  

She paused there, then gave me a troubled smile before looking at me.  
**時雨:** "...I think it must be lonely not being able to rely on yourself?"  

Her smile pierced my heart like a dagger.

Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
Looking at her phone, Shigure furrows her brow. Seeing Shigure frozen in place, Kashou guesses the caller ID.  
[Kashou]: "From your parents' house? You need to answer that."  
[Shigure]: "...I can tell even without them saying anything. I came out without telling you where I was going."  
The phone in Shigure's hand finally stops ringing.  
Shigure, mirroring his silence, clutches her phone tightly.  
[Shigure]: "…Is it because I'm still a girl who hasn't reached womanhood?"  
[Shigure]: "Or is it because I'm an innocent child who knows nothing of the world?"  
[Shigure]: "...So, am I supposed to obey what Father and Mother say?"  
[Shigure]: "...I want to stay here."  
[Shigure]: "Even if my brother is suffering… even just being by his side…"

Question:

不安でぎゅっと手を握り合う。
冷たいシャッターを見上げて下唇をきゅっと噛む。
[警察]: 「キミたち、何してるの？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ……警察さん！」
[ショコラ]: 「開いてる病院教えてもらえませんか！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまが大変で！　それで、お医者さん呼ぼうと思って！」
[バニラ]: 「病院が休みで、どうすればいいか分からなくて……」
[警察]: 「飼い主さんが？　それは大変だけど……」
[警察]: 「キミたち鈴は？　持ってないの？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「あっ……！」
指摘されて首元に手を当てる。
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」
[Chocola]: 「Master is in trouble, so we wanted to get a doctor!」
[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」
[Police Officer]: 「Your Master is? That's a quite a problem, but...」
[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.
ModelAnswer:
**Vanilla:** "I don't know where any other hospitals are... And there aren’t any people walking around to ask for directions..."
**Vanilla:** "But I can’t just go home like this… What should we do?"
She clutches her hands together, feeling anxious.
She looks up at the cold shutter and bites her lower lip.
**Police Officer:** "What are you two doing here?"
**Chocola:** "Oh... Police officer!"
**Chocola:** "Can you tell us where a hospital is open?!"
**Chocola:** "My master is in trouble! That’s why I was thinking of calling the doctor!"
**Vanilla:** "The hospitals are closed, and we don’t know what to do..."
**Police Officer:** "Your owner? That’s rough..."
**Police Officer:** "Do you two have a bell? You’re not wearing one?"
**Chocola & Vanilla:** "Ah...!"
They realize this as they touch their necks.

Question:

[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Good morning, Master."  
**Shigure:** "I've been thinking a lot about what happened this time."  

A clear, cloudless smile. The other cats are smiling at me in the same way.  
Cold sweat trickles down my back as I force out:  
**Kashō:** "Haa… What exactly did you think about?"  

**Shigure:** "I realized that it's impossible for Master to push himself too hard because of what happened this time."  
**Shigure:** "But, I was also worried sick as your sister, unable to sleep at night…"  
**Shigure:** "So, I thought the best solution would be to increase personnel and reduce Master's burden."  

**Kashō:** "...Haa..."

The rush of customers has finally died down, and we're done bringing out the customers' orders. They're all sitting, quietly enjoying their tea and cake.

[Kashou]: 「You see... Dad was planning on making me run the family business. Or, so I thought. I'm not too sure about now.」

[Kashou]: 「Dad was also the one who taught me the basics of culinary arts.」
[Kashou]: 「It was a tough process, and I did harbor some resentment over it all, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Nowadays, I'm grateful that all of that ended up being useful.」
[Kashou]: 「But, I was opposed... to me running the family business as if it were already set in stone.」

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[シナモン]: 「はぁ……料理もいいけど、この紅茶……いい香り～。弾けるような味わい、さすがメーちゃんチョイス♪」
[メイプル]: 「パーティーには香りの強い茶葉が合うわね。今日はシャンパンフレーバーよ」
[メイプル]: 「ガラスのティーポットなら、茶葉に入った花びらが、お湯に踊る様子も楽しめるの」
[シナモン]: 「最高～♪　最高だよ、メーちゃん～♪　シナモン、潤っちゃうぅぅぅ～……！」
[時雨]: 「母様、改めまして――お誕生日、おめでとうございます」
言いながら、時雨がラッピングされた小箱を取りだした。
[淡雪]: 「あら、なにかしら？」
[時雨]: 「写真立てです。前に、大きいのが欲しいとおっしゃっていたので」
[淡雪]: 「あらあら、嬉しいわ！　いいのかしら、いいのかしら？　ありがとう、時雨！」
reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Hah... The dishes are good for sure, but this tea... Such a heavenly aroma~ The flavor is bursting in my mouth. Your tea choices are second to none, May-chan♪」
[Maple]: 「Tea leaves with a rich aroma suit a party atmosphere well. Today, I went with a champagne flavor.」
[Maple]: 「And with a glass teapot, you get to enjoy the sight of the flower petals mixed with the tea leaves dancing around in the water.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Fantastic~ Absolutely fantastic, May-chan~♪ Cinnamon is drooliiiing~...!」
[Shigure]: 「Mother, I'd like to say it once more: Happy birthday to you.」
Shigure pulls out a small gift-wrapped box as she speaks.
[Awayuki]: 「My, my, what could it be?」
[Shigure]: 「A picture frame. I got it because you mentioned that you wanted a big one before.」
[Awayuki]: 「My, oh my, this is wonderful! Are you sure? Are you positive? Thank you, Shigure!」
ModelAnswer:
[Cinnamon]: "Haa... Food's good, but this tea... such a nice scent~. A burst of flavor, just like Mei-chan chose♪"  
[Maple]: "Strong-smelling tea leaves are perfect for parties. Today it’s champagne-flavored."  
[Maple]: "With a glass teapot, you can enjoy the petals inside dancing in the hot water too!"  
[Cinnamon]: "Amazing~♪ Amazing, Mei-chan~♪ Cinnamon's getting all dewy...!"  

[Shigure]: "Mother, or rather—Happy birthday!"  
Saying this, Shigure took out a wrapped small box.  
[Tanukaze]: "Oh? What is it?"  
[Shigure]: "A photo frame. You said you wanted a big one before."  
[Tanukaze]: "Oh my, how lovely! Is that alright, is that alright? Thank you, Shigure!"

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「はーい！　ショコラとバニラは、ドングリのネックレスを作りました！」
[バニラ]: 「作りました」
[メイプル]: 「あたしたちは茶葉を用意したわ。渡しておくけど、飲みたいときには言ってちょうだい」
[シナモン]: 「それと、わたしとメーちゃんで、演奏します～」
[メイプル]: 「今！？」
[シナモン]: 「そうだよ、メーちゃん。だってプレゼントタイムだもの～」
[メイプル]: 「えっ、でも、心の準備が……」
[メイプル]: 「あ、そうだ。まだ嘉祥が渡してないじゃないの」
[嘉祥]: 「……申し訳ない」
[嘉祥]: 「ケーキや料理のことばかり考えて、誕生日プレゼントを忘れていた」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「Here you go! Chocola and Vanilla made you an acorn necklace!」
[Vanilla]: 「That we did.」
[Maple]: 「I've got some tea leaves for you. I'll give them to you, but just let me know when you want to actually drink them.」
[Cinnamon]: 「Yes, and in addition, May-chan and I will be doing a number for you~」
[Maple]: 「Right now?!」
[Cinnamon]: 「Right now, May-chan. It is present time, after all~」
[Maple]: 「Huh? But I'm not mentally ready yet...」
[Maple]: 「Oh, that's right. Kashou still hasn't given his present yet, has he?」
[Kashou]: 「...I'm sorry.」
[Kashou]: 「I was so preoccupied with the cake and cooking that I'd forgotten about getting a birthday present.」
ModelAnswer:
**Chocola:** "Yay! Chocola and Vanilla made a acorn necklace!"  
**Vanilla:** "We did."  
**Maple:** "We prepared the tea leaves. Here, take it if you want to drink it."  
**Cinnamon:** "And me and May-chan will play for you~"  
**Maple:** "Now!?"  
**Cinnamon:** "That's right, May-chan! It's present time!"  
**Maple:** "Eh, but I'm not ready..."  
**Maple:** "Oh, right. Master hasn't given us anything yet."  
**Kashou:** "...Sorry."  
**Kashou:** "I was only thinking about the cake and food that I forgot to give you birthday presents."  

*(Note: The honorific "-san" is implied in Kashou's name but not explicitly used as it’s a common suffix. Onomatopoeia like 'doki doki' isn’t present here, so no translation is needed.)*

Question:
[淡雪]: 「昔から、嘉祥は１つのことに夢中になると、他のことを忘れてしまうんだから」
[嘉祥]: 「返す言葉もない」
[淡雪]: 「いいのよ、嘉祥はケーキ屋さんなんだから。ケーキが一番のプレゼントだわ」
[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってもらえると……。でも、近いうちに持ってくるよ」
[淡雪]: 「そう？　楽しみにしているわ」
[時雨]: 「それでは、ちょっと予定と違いますが、ケーキを出しましょうか」
[ショコラ]: 「わーい！　ご主人さまのケーキにゃ！」
[ココナツ]: 「ケーキ！　ぼ、ぼく、持ってくるよ！！」
[バニラ]: 「待った、ココナツ。落ちついて。ステイ」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「You've always been the type to forget about everything else when you get focused on one thing, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't know what to say.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, it's fine. You're a cake baker, Kashou. A cake is the best present I could ask for.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm glad to hear you say that... Still, I'll bring you a proper present sometime soon.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, really? Then, I look forward to it.」
[Shigure]: 「Well then, it deviates from my plans slightly, but why don't we bring out the cake now?」
[Chocola]: 「Yay! It's time for Master's cake, nya!」
[Coconut]: 「Cake! I-I volunteer to bring it out!」
[Vanilla]: 「Hold it, Coconut. Down, girl. Stay.」
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Awayuki]: "Ever since he was little, Master gets so absorbed in one thing that he forgets everything else."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "I have no words to respond."  
[Minaduki Awayuki]: "It's okay, Master is a cake shop owner. Cake is the best present."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "If you say so… I'll bring it soon."  
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Then, since our plans are slightly off, shall we serve the cake?"  
[Chocola]: "Yay! Master's cake, meow!"  
[Coconut]: "Cake! B-but, I'll get it!!"  
[Vanilla]: "Wait, Coconut. Calm down. Stay."

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female

[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
Question:
お客さんからお褒めの言葉をもらうことはあるが、母親から言われると妙に照れてしまう。
ネコたちも、瞳を輝かせていた。
[ショコラ]: 「ステキですにゃ、ご主人さま～！」
[バニラ]: 「良い」
[アズキ]: 「まぁ、アタシは手伝ったから、完成品を見てっけどな」
[メイプル]: 「気合い入ってるわね」
[シナモン]: 「お、おいしそう～……じゅるり」
[ココナツ]: 「すごい……かわいい。食べちゃうのがもったいないくらいだよ！」
[淡雪]: 「ほんと。切ってしまうのが、もったいないわねー」
[淡雪]: 「ずっと部屋に飾っておきたいくらい」
[時雨]: 「わかります、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「でしょう？」
reference_answer:
I've certainly gotten compliments from customers before, but getting one from my own mother is making me blush, oddly enough.
All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.
[Chocola]: 「That is so lovely, Master~!」
[Vanilla]: 「Very good.」
[Azuki]: 「I mean, I helped with it, but call me curious to see the finished product.」
[Maple]: 「You really went all out.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I-It looks so delicious~... Slurp.」
[Coconut]: 「Amazing... It's so cute. It almost feels like a shame to eat it!」
[Awayuki]: 「It really does. Cutting into it feels almost criminal.」
[Awayuki]: 「I want to just keep it as a room decoration forever.」
[Shigure]: 「I know how you feel, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「Right?」
ModelAnswer:
I receive compliments from customers, but it's strangely embarrassing when my mother says them.  
The cats were sparkling with excitement too.  

**[Shokora]**: "It's wonderful, Master~!"  
**[Vanilla]**: "Good."  
**[Azuki]**: "Well, I helped out a bit, so I get to see the finished product."  
**[Maple]**: "You put your heart into this."  
**[Cinnamon]**: "Oh, it looks delicious~... *gulp*."  
**[Coconut]**: "Amazing… so cute. It's too good to eat!"  
**[Awayuki]**: "Really. I feel like we shouldn't cut it up."  
**[Awayuki]**: "I want to keep it in my room forever."  
**[Shigure]**: "I understand, Mother!"  
**[Awayuki]**: "See?"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「それだと食べられないので……切りますよ？」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。仕方ありません、やってください、メイプル」
[メイプル]: 「さくさくさく、っと」
メイプルがケーキに包丁を入れ、手早く切り分けていく。
[淡雪]: 「あらー……」
[淡雪]: 「なんだか、ネコたちも、ずいぶん手慣れたわね。包丁の扱いがプロみたいだわ」
[時雨]: 「お店で働いてますから、もうプロですよ、母様」
[淡雪]: 「あら、そうよね！　うふふ……頼もしいわね」
ケーキが切り分け終わった、そのときだった――
玄関のほうから、扉が開く音がする。
[時雨]: 「えっ！？」
[淡雪]: 「あら、この開け方は、お父さまねぇ。今日は早く帰ってきたみたい」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「We won't be able to eat it if it spoils, so... it has to get cut.」
[Shigure]: 「You're right. It's a necessary evil. Please, do the deed, Maple.」
[Maple]: 「All right, slice, slice, slice.」
Maple puts the kitchen knife into the cake and quickly slices the cake into pieces.
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my...」
[Awayuki]: 「Seems the catgirls have become quite skilled themselves. She's handling the knife like a professional.」
[Shigure]: 「They all work in the shop, so they are professionals, Mother.」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh my, that's right! Tee hee hee... Such reliable girls.」
Once the cake is all sliced up, that's when it happens—
From the foyer, the sound of the door opening echoes.
[Shigure]: 「Huh?!」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh, that sounds like your father opening the door. He must be back early today.」
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "Then it can't be eaten... I'll cut it up, okay?"
[Shigure]: "That's right. Fine, go ahead, Maple."
[Maple]: "Snip snip, snip!"
Maple plunges the knife into the cake and quickly slices it.
[Awayuki]: "Oh dear..."
[Awayuki]: "The cats seem to be quite skilled too. They handle that knife like pros."
[Shigure]: "I work at a shop, so I'm practically a pro already, Mother."
[Awayuki]: "Oh, is that right! Hehe... That's reassuring."
Just as the cake was finished being cut—
The sound of the front door opening came from outside.
[Shigure]: "Eh?!"
[Awayuki]: "Oh dear, Father's style. Looks like he got home early today."

metadata:
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Suhama (水無月 州浜) | Gender: Male
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
俺は緊張して身を固くする。
ネコたちも息を呑んだ。
[州浜]: 「…………ふん」
この男が、俺の父親――水無月州浜だ。
[時雨]: 「あの、父様……今夜は、商工会の寄合だったはずでは……？」
[州浜]: 「そうだが……私が帰宅すると、不都合でも？」
[時雨]: 「そ、そんなことは……」
[ショコラ]: 「あの！　ご主人さまのお父さま、お帰りなさーい！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人のお父上、予想外にお早いご帰宅」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お父さま、お帰りなさいませ！」
[州浜]: 「うむ」
[メイプル]: 「……これ、やばいんじゃないかしら？」
reference_answer:
My body freezes up from the tension.
The catgirls are also taken aback.
[Suhama]: 「...Hmph.」
This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.
[Shigure]: 「Um, Father... I thought you had a community chamber get-together to attend tonight...?」
[Suhama]: 「I did. Is there something wrong with me coming back home?」
[Shigure]: 「N-No, that isn't what I meant...」
[Chocola]: 「Um! Welcome back home, Master's Father!」
[Vanilla]: 「Master's Father, you have returned earlier than we anticipated.」
[Coconut]: 「F-Father, welcome back!」
[Suhama]: 「Mm-hmm.」
[Maple]: 「...Hey, isn't this bad news?」
ModelAnswer:
I tense up, bracing myself.  
The cats gasp in unison.  

**Suhama:** "…………Hmph."  
This man is my father—Minaduki Suhama.  

**Shigure:** "Um, Father… shouldn't you be at the Chamber of Commerce meeting tonight?"  

**Suhama:** "That's right… Is there a problem if I return now?"  

**Shigure:** "N-no way…"  

**Chocola:** "Oh! Master's father, welcome home!"  

**Vanilla:** "Master, your father returned surprisingly early."  

**Coconut:** "F-Father, welcome back!"  

**Suhama:** "Hmph."  

**Maple:** "...This is bad, isn't it?"

Question:
[淡雪]: 「嬉しかったわよ。こんな賑やかなのは久しぶりだもの」
[淡雪]: 「お父さま、座ってはどうかしら。嘉祥のケーキ、とっても美味しそうでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「あ、そうです！　父様、今日こそ兄様のケーキを食べてください！」
[時雨]: 「食べてみれば、兄様が本気で打ちこんでいるってわかるはずです！」
俺は思わず息を呑んだ。父親が、俺の作ったケーキを食べるだろうか？
何と言うだろうか？
[ショコラ]: 「賛成です！　ご主人さまの美味しいケーキを食べれば、みんな仲良しにゃのです！」
[バニラ]: 「間違いない」
[ココナツ]: 「うんうん！　お兄ちゃんのケーキ、本当に美味しいんだから！」
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「I'm so glad that you did. It hasn't been this lively in quite some time, after all.」
[Awayuki]: 「Father, why not take a seat? Kashou's cake looks quite good, doesn't it?」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, yes! Father, today should be the day you partake in one of Nii-sama's cakes!」
[Shigure]: 「If you do, you will realize that Nii-sama has really devoted his all toward baking it!」
I find myself taken aback. Would Dad consider eating a cake I made?
What would he say?
[Chocola]: 「Chocola agrees! One bite of Master's delicious cake and everyone gets alyong!」
[Vanilla]: 「Without a shadow of a doubt.」
[Coconut]: 「Yeah! Yeah! Onii-chan's cakes are really good, after all!」
ModelAnswer:
[Dawn Snow]: "I'm so happy. It's been a while since I've seen such a lively gathering."
[Dawn Snow]: "Father, why don't you sit down? Master Kashou's cake looks absolutely delicious!"
[Shigure]: "Ah, that's right! Father, please try Brother's cake today!"  
"Once you taste it, you'll know he really put his heart into making it!"

I couldn't help but gasp. Would my father actually eat the cake I made? What would he say?

[Chocola]: "Agreed! Eating Master Kashou's delicious cake will make everyone get along nicely!"
[Vanilla]: "Absolutely."
[Coconut]: "Yeah, yeah! Brother's cake is really good!"

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ちがうんですか……？！」
[州浜]: 「ふぅ……口で言ってもわからんようだな」
[州浜]: 「しばらく待っているがいい」
父親が部屋を出て行った。
[嘉祥]: 「なんだっていうんだ……」
[時雨]: 「ごめんなさい、兄様、母様……私のせいで……せっかくの誕生日パーティーが……」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨は何も悪くない。さっきも言ったが……今日、帰ってきたのは、俺が決めたことだ」
[淡雪]: 「そうよ。昔みたいに賑やかで楽しいわ」
[時雨]: 「でも、ケンカみたいになってしまって……」
[淡雪]: 「ふふ……嘉祥とお父さまは、いつもこんな調子よ」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「You mean that isn't it...?!」
[Suhama]: 「Sigh... Seems that telling you isn't enough for you to understand.」
[Suhama]: 「Just wait here.」
Dad leaves the room.
[Kashou]: 「What's he trying to prove?」
[Shigure]: 「I'm sorry, Nii-sama, Mother... It is my fault for spoiling your birthday party...」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, you did nothing wrong. I said it before... Coming back home today was my decision.」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. Besides, it's been lively and fun just like the old days.」
[Shigure]: 「But things seems to be developing into a fight...」
[Awayuki]: 「Tee hee, Kashou and your father always go at it like this.」
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: "Is it not...?!"
[Suhama]: "Hmph… seems like you can't understand even if I say it."  
[Suhama]: "Wait here for a while."  

The father left the room.  
[Kashou]: "What's with that?"  
[Shigure]: "I'm sorry, Brother, Mother… it's my fault… our birthday party was supposed to be…"  
[Kashou]: "It's not your fault, Shigure. I said before… today returning home is something I decided."  
[Awayuki]: "That's right. It'll be lively and fun like the old days."  
[Shigure]: "But it turned into a fight again…"  
[Awayuki]: "Hehe… Kashou and Father are always like this."

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
俺は、それだけを告げると、水無月の家から出ていた。まるで逃げるように。
いろいろなことが頭の中で駆け巡り、思考がごちゃごちゃになった。
気がつけば、俺は夜の公園にいた。
[嘉祥]: 「あ……」
家の鍵もサイフも、全て鞄に入れて、置いてきてしまった。
[嘉祥]: 「……なにやってるんだ、俺は」
[ショコラ]: 「……ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ……！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物」
バニラの手には、俺の鞄があった。
[嘉祥]: 「持ってきてくれたのか、バニラ」
[バニラ]: 「当然のこと。野宿は困る」
[嘉祥]: 「そりゃそうだな」
鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」
[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
**Vanilla:** "…Master!"  
**Minaduki Kashou:** "...What am I doing?"  

**Chocola:** "...Master..."  
**Minaduki Kashou:** "Chocola...!"  
**Vanilla:** "Master, you forgot something."  
Vanilla held my bag in her hand.  
**Minaduki Kashou:** "You brought it back, Vanilla?"  
**Vanilla:** "Of course. I can't let you sleep outside."  
**Minaduki Kashou:** "That's right..."  

Without the keys, not only would I be locked out, but so would the two of them.

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ショコラたちは大丈夫です！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまは、大丈夫ですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ……もちろん」
[嘉祥]: 「……いや……どうかな？」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物を持ってきたご褒美はある？」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ？　何か欲しいのか？」
[バニラ]: 「あそこに自販機がある。温かい飲み物を買ってくる。今夜は冷える」
[嘉祥]: 「……わかった」
ご褒美と言ったが……バニラは、俺のために温かい飲み物を買ってきてくれるのだろう。
いつの間にか、ずいぶんと身体が冷えていた。
[バニラ]: 「どうぞ、ご主人」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうな、バニラ」
俺は買ってきてもらった缶コーヒーを受け取った。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「Chocola and Vanilla are fine!」
[Chocola]: 「But are you okay, Master?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah... Of course.」
[Kashou]: 「...Actually... I'm not sure.」
[Vanilla]: 「Master, do I get a reward for retrieving your bag?」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Did you want something?」
[Vanilla]: 「There is a vending machine over there. I'll buy some warm drinks. Tonight is chilly.」
[Kashou]: 「...Sure.」
Vanilla's calling it a 'reward', but... she's going off to buy a warm drink for me and not the other way around.
I do feel pretty darn cold, now that I realize it, though.
[Vanilla]: 「Here you go, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, thanks, Vanilla.」
I take the can of coffee that Vanilla bought for me.
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: "The Chocolas are safe!"
[Chocola]: "Master, are you alright?"
[Kashou]: "Ah… of course."
[Kashou]: "...Well... maybe not so much."
[Vanilla]: "Master, is there a reward for bringing back forgotten items?"
[Kashou]: "Huh? Do you want something?"
[Vanilla]: "There's a vending machine over there. I'll buy some warm drinks. It’s going to be cold tonight."
[Kashou]: "...Alright."
I said it was a reward, but… Vanilla will probably bring me back warm drinks.
Before I knew it, my body had gotten quite cold.
[Vanilla]: "Here you go, Master."
[Kashou]: "Thanks, Vanilla."
I took the canned coffee she bought for me.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
立ちあがって、前を向くしかない。
[ショコラ]: 「私も、いっしょに頑張ります！」
[バニラ]: 「応援する、ご主人」
[嘉祥]: 「……ありがとう」
[嘉祥]: 「また、頑張ってみるよ。いつか、親父に美味いって言わせてみせる」
[ショコラ]: 「そうですよ！」
[バニラ]: 「楽しみ」
俺は立ち上がり、缶コーヒーを一気に飲み干した。
[嘉祥]: 「よし！　やるぞ！」
[ショコラ]: 「はい、ご主人さま！」
[バニラ]: 「えいえいおー」
[嘉祥]: 「家まで競争！」
[ショコラ]: 「にゃー！？　まだコーヒーが！　あっ、あっ、待ってくださいー！」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、早くー」
reference_answer:
I just have to pull myself up and move forward.
[Chocola]: 「Chocola will work right alongside you!」
[Vanilla]: 「I'll support you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「...Thank you.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm going to give it another try, and one day, I'll get my dad to call my cooking 'delicious'.」
[Chocola]: 「That's right!」
[Vanilla]: 「That day will come.」
I stand up and chug the rest of my coffee.
[Kashou]: 「All right! Let's do this!」
[Chocola]: 「Yes, Master!」
[Vanilla]: 「Three cheers.」
[Kashou]: 「Race you to the house!」
[Chocola]: 「Nya?! But Chocola still has coffee left! Ah, ah, please wait!!」
[Vanilla]: 「Hurry up, Chocola.」
ModelAnswer:
Standing up, I have no choice but to face forward.  
**Chocola:** "I'll do my best too!"  
**Vanilla:** "Cheerleading for you, Master."  
**Kashou:** "...Thanks."  
**Kashou:** "I'll try again. Someday, I'll make Old Man proud by saying it's delicious."  
**Chocola:** "That's right!"  
**Vanilla:** "Looking forward to it."  

I stood up and drained my can of coffee in one gulp.  
**Kashou:** "Alright! Let's do this!"  
**Chocola:** "Yes, Master!"  
**Vanilla:** "Eieiei—!"  
**Kashou:** "Race you home!"  
**Chocola:** "Nya!? Still got coffee! Ah, ah, wait up—"  
**Vanilla:** "Chocola, hurry!"

Question:
[メイプル]: 「何度見ても、圧巻ではあるわね」
[シナモン]: 「湯煙と水音がいいんですよね～」
[ココナツ]: 「なんか、行列ができてるよ、お兄ちゃん」
[ショコラ]: 「くんくん……温泉とは違う、いいニオイが……」
[バニラ]: 「これは……鳥？」
[時雨]: 「あれは、有名な焼き鳥屋さんですね」
[ショコラ]: 「にゃんと！？」
[バニラ]: 「ごくり」
[ココナツ]: 「お、お兄ちゃん！」
[嘉祥]: 「あー……」
[時雨]: 「ふふ……せっかく観光に来たのだし、いろいろ見たり、食べたりしましょうか」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「This is always a treat for the eyes, no matter how many times you see it.」
[Cinnamon]: 「The steam and sounds of the water sure are nice, aren't they~?」
[Coconut]: 「Looks like there's a line for something, Onii-chan.」
[Chocola]: 「Sniff, sniff... It's not the hot spring, but it sure smells nice...」
[Vanilla]: 「Is that... chicken?」
[Shigure]: 「That is the famous yakitori chicken stall, I believe.」
[Chocola]: 「What did nyou say?!」
[Vanilla]: 「Gulp.」
[Coconut]: 「O-Onii-chan!」
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
[Shigure]: 「Tee hee... We might as well use the opportunity to partake in the local sights and cuisine while we're here.」
ModelAnswer:
**[MeiPuru]**: "No matter how many times I see it, it's still impressive."  
**[Shinomizuki Shigure]**: "The steam and the sound of water are so nice~"  
**[Kokonatsu]**: "There's a line forming, bro!"  
**[Chocola]**: "Hnnn… It smells good, not like a hot spring…"  
**[Vanilla]**: "Is that… a bird?"  
**[Shigure]**: "That’s the famous yakitori shop."  
**[Chocola]**: "Meow?!"  
**[Vanilla]**: "Gulp."  
**[Kokonatsu]**: "O-oh, bro!"  
**[Minaduki Kashou]**: "Ah…"  
**[Shigure]**: "Hehe… Since we’re on vacation, let’s see and eat some things."

Question:
[メイプル]: 「嘉祥も協力してちょうだい。はい、あーん」
チーズケーキをプラスチックのフォークで切り取り、メイプルが差し出してきた。
[嘉祥]: 「あ、ああ……」
口に入れる。
[時雨]: 「その手が……！　やりますね、メイプル」
[ココナツ]: 「いいなー……もう食べちゃった」
味は、ちゃんとチーズケーキだった。
[嘉祥]: 「たしかに、美味しいな」
[シナモン]: 「ですよね～♪」
[メイプル]: 「最近はコンビニスイーツも、レベルが上がってきてるわね」
[時雨]: 「さあ、行きますよ。チェックインの予定時刻を過ぎてしまいますからね」
[ショコラ]: 「はーい！」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「Kashou, help me out here. Here, say aaah.」
Maple breaks off a chunk of the cheesecake with a plastic fork and holds it out to me.
[Kashou]: 「R-Right...」
I take a bite.
[Shigure]: 「That technique...! Not bad, Maple.」
[Coconut]: 「Lucky... I already ate mine.」
It's a proper cheesecake, in terms of flavor.
[Kashou]: 「You're right, it is pretty good.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I told you~♪」
[Maple]: 「These store sweets are really upping their game nowadays.」
[Shigure]: 「Okay, time to head over. It is already past check-in time.」
[Chocola]: 「Okay!」
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "Kashou, you should help too. Okay, aah~"  
She cut the cheesecake with a plastic fork and offered it to Kashou.  

[Kashou]: "Ah, ah…"  
He put it in his mouth.  

[Shigure]: "That hand…! I'm going to do it, Maple."  

[Cocount]: "Lucky you~… already ate it"  
The taste was definitely cheesecake.  

[Kashou]: "It's true, delicious."  

[Cinnamon]: "Right? ♪"  

[Maple]: "Even convenience store sweets are getting better lately."  

[Shigure]: "Alright, let's go. We'll be late for check-in if we don't hurry."  

[Chocola]: "Okay!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「ふふ……私は兄様を応援していますから」
[時雨]: 「ここで英気を養って、兄様が頑張ってくださる……その姿こそが、私の一番の幸福です」
[嘉祥]: 「そう言ってくれるのは、嬉しいけどな」
[時雨]: 「むしろ、私の生き甲斐。養分。必須栄養素。水と空気と太陽光なのです」
大袈裟な――と思ったが、俺は時雨の応援に甘えることにした。
チェックインを済ませ、部屋へ。
[時雨]: 「あの……どうですか、兄様？　おかしく、ありませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「よく似合うよ、時雨。いつも和服だから、まったく違和感ない」
[時雨]: 「はう……そうですよね。嬉しいような、肩透かしのような……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Hee hee... I am here to support you, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「Seeing you regain your energy here and working your hardest is the ultimate happiness for me.」
[Kashou]: 「I do appreciate you saying that, but still...」
[Shigure]: 「In fact, it is my purpose in life. My nourishment, my essential nutrients, my water, air, and sunlight.」
While I think she's exaggerating like crazy, I decide to take Shigure up on her support.
We finish checking in and head to our rooms.
[Shigure]: 「Um... How is it, Nii-sama? It doesn't look... odd, I hope?」
[Kashou]: 「It looks great on you, Shigure. You always wear Japanese clothes anyway, so there's not a single thing off about it.」
[Shigure]: 「Hngh... Yes, I suppose. Though, I'm not sure if that is a compliment or a deflection...」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Hehe… I'm cheering for my older brother."  
**Shigure:** "Recharging here, watching you work hard… that's the happiest thing in the world to me."  
**Kashou:** "I'm glad you say that, but…"  
**Shigure:** "No, it’s what gives my life meaning. It’s nourishment. An essential nutrient—like water and air and sunlight!"  

*(She exaggerated a bit—I thought—but I decided to indulge her support.)*  

After checking in, we went to our room.  
**Shigure:** "Um… how do you like it, Kashou? Is it weird?"  
**Kashou:** "You look great, Shigure. You always wear kimonos, so it doesn't feel strange at all."  
**Shigure:** "Haaah… I guess so. It's both heartwarming and a bit of a letdown…"

[バニラ]: 「卓球……」
[ショコラ]: 「さっき、美味しそうなニオイがした！　あれなにかな？」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、夕飯が近いから、食べ過ぎないようにな？」
[ショコラ]: 「ハッ！　そうだった。ショコラ、気をつけます！」
[時雨]: 「兄様は、どちらへ行かれますか？」
reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「All right! How's about we play a game since it's been a minute?」
[Coconut]: 「A game?」
[Cinnamon]: 「May-chan, I saw a ping-pong table earlier~」
[Maple]: 「Cinnamon, you KNOW that you've never once beaten me... But, oh well, fine. I'll get rusty if I don't cut loose every now and then.」
[Vanilla]: 「Ping-pong...」

ModelAnswer:

[Cocount]: "Game?!"
[Cinnamon]: "Mee-chan, there was a ping pong table earlier~?"
[Maple]: "Cinnamon, you've never beaten me... well, fine. I need to keep my skills sharp."
[Vanilla]: "Ping pong..."
[Chocola]: "I smelled something delicious just now! What was that?"
[Kashou]: "Chocola, dinner's almost ready, so don't eat too much!"
[Chocola]: "Right! Got it. Chocola will be careful!"
[Shigure]: "Master, where are you going?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
I had something I wanted to ask my supplier. It wasn't urgent, but it would be best to call them early.

If it were a commercial bakery, this might seem normal, but I negotiate with each of my suppliers personally.

Even ingredients not generally available can be sold by farmers if you order in large quantities.

The pursuit of flavor is also a journey to find ingredients.

It wouldn't be appropriate to talk business when everyone else is enjoying the tourism, so I said I had personal matters and left the room.

Just in case, I went outside the inn and decided to speak somewhere quiet.

I made the call.

[Kashou]: "Bonjour, this is Kashou Minaduki from La Soleil Japon. Could I please speak with Mr. James Carter?"

[Kashou]: "Phew..."

They were surprised it was an order from overseas, but they seemed willing to ship it after all.

I returned inside the inn.

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「ほっ！　はっ！」
[バニラ]: 「……ふっ……ぬっ」
[メイプル]: 「意外とやるわね、バニラ。このあたしと互角だなんて……！」
[バニラ]: 「互角？　ポイントは私が先行している」
[メイプル]: 「ふっ……言うじゃない。ひさびさに本気が出せそうね」
[バニラ]: 「ゲーム後に次は本気の本気なんて……」
[メイプル]: 「言わないわよ！　はぁぁぁ！！　せいっ！！」
[バニラ]: 「ッ！！」
ものすごい速さで白球が行き交う。
ラケットが球を打つ音が、まるでドラムの連打のようだ。
カッ！　カッ！　カッ！　カッ！　カッ！　カッ！　カッ！
[メイプル]: 「あら、嘉祥、どうしたの？」
[バニラ]: 「あ、ご主人」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「Ho! Hah!」
[Vanilla]: 「...Fhh... Nh!」
[Maple]: 「You're better than I thought, Vanilla. Can't believe you're going toe-to-toe with me!」
[Vanilla]: 「Toe-to-toe? I have the point lead.」
[Maple]: 「Whew... Big talk. I might have to get serious for the first time in a while.」
[Vanilla]: 「After the game, don't tell me you're going to say, 'This time, it's REALLY on'...」
[Maple]: 「I will not! Haaah! Seh-yah!!」
[Vanilla]: 「...!!」
The ping-pong ball volleys back and forth between them at intense speeds.
The sound of the paddles hitting the ball almost sounds like a drum solo.
Tic! Tic! Tic! Tic! Tic! Tic! Tic!
[Maple]: 「My, my, Kashou, what's wrong?」
[Vanilla]: 「Oh, Master.」
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "Whoa! Hah!"
[Vanilla]: "...Huff... Huff..."
[Maple]: "You're surprisingly good, Vanilla. To be on par with me...!"
[Vanilla]: "On par? The advantage is I'm ahead."
[Maple]: "Hmph... Told you so. Feels like I can finally go all out for once."
[Vanilla]: "After the game next time, full-on serious..."
[Maple]: "I won't say it! Haaah!! Sei!!"
[Vanilla]: "Ugh!!"

The white balls fly back and forth at incredible speed.
The sound of rackets hitting the ball is like a drum roll.
Clack! Clack! Clack! Clack! Clack! Clack! Clack!
[Maple]: "Oh, Kashou, what's wrong?"
[Vanilla]: "Ah, Master."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「すまない。邪魔したか」
[メイプル]: 「なにを言っているのかしら、こんなの遊びよ？」
[バニラ]: 「さっき、本気と言っていたけど」
[メイプル]: 「うっ……次から。次から本気よ」
どうやら、今さっきのラリーはバニラが制したらしい。
[嘉祥]: 「ぜんぜん球が見えなかったよ。やっぱり、ネコは凄いんだなあ」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、それは違う」
[メイプル]: 「ネコでも、苦手な子は苦手よ？　シナモンなんて、すぐ空振りするし」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラは手でキャッチしちゃう」
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……」
それでショコラやシナモンは他の所へ行き、この２人だけで勝負していたわけか。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、メイプルとバニラだけって珍しいな」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, catch you guys at a bad time?」
[Maple]: 「What are you talking about? We're just playing a game.」
[Vanilla]: 「You said that you were taking it seriously a second ago.」
[Maple]: 「Urk... This time. This time, it's for real.」
It seems that Vanilla won their last rally.
[Kashou]: 「I wasn't able to see the ball again. Catgirls really are something else.」
[Vanilla]: 「Master, that's not true.」
[Maple]: 「Even with catgirls, if it's not your forte, then it's not your forte. Like, take Cinnamon. Give her a paddle and she'll whiff immediately.」
[Vanilla]: 「And Chocola tries to catch the ball with her hands.」
[Kashou]: 「Interesting.」
So Chocola and Cinnamon went somewhere else while these two duked it out in ping-pong, then.
[Kashou]: 「Now that I think of it, seeing you two together is a rare sight.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kaishou]: "Sorry. Did I interrupt?"  
[Meypuaru]: "What are you talking about? This is just a game, after all."  
[Vanira]: "I was serious earlier!"  
[Meypuaru]: "Ugh… next time. Next time, I'll be serious."  
Apparently, the last round was won by Vanira.  
[Kaishou]: "I couldn't see the ball at all. Cats are amazing after all."  
[Vanira]: "Master, that's not right!"  
[Meypuaru]: "Even cats have their limits! Cinnamon keeps missing completely."  
[Vanira]: "Chocola catches it with her hands."  
[Kaishou]: "I see…"  
So Chocola and Cinnamon went elsewhere, leaving just these two to compete.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
**Kashō:** "Which one should I try?"  
He bought a *onsen manju* (温泉まんじゅう) from the stall.  
It was freshly made, piping hot.  
Taking a bite, it was fluffy and had a moister texture than he expected.  
The red bean paste crumbled on his tongue, spreading sweetness.  

**Kashō:** "I see… *hohoho*… This is delicious."  
He never served warm sweets at home—neither the Western pastries he made nor the traditional Japanese confections from his family shop.  
Eating a steaming hot manju while making *hohoho* sounds was an amusing experience in itself.  

**Kashō:** "Come to think of it, I’ve been to the onsen town several times… but never eaten one."  
That’s because there were no cats back then.  
Even when his parents and Shigure and he went on trips together, they never talked about buying snacks along the way.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」

詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashō]: "Hey, you were here, Shigure. Any business?"  
[Shigure]: "No, I'm fine now."  
[Kashō]: "Maybe you had a work call too, Shigure?"  
[Shigure]: "...Y-yes. Sorry. Even during our trip..."  
[Kashō]: "There's no need to apologize. Soléil is closed on weekdays, but the world still has its own schedule."  

(I haven't heard much about it, but apparently, you run a company.)  
(With that income, you buy clothes for the cats and even let them take the bell exam.)  
(Dad's strict with me but dotes on Shigure. He lets us do whatever we want—cats or business.)  

[Kashō]: "The cats were enjoying themselves as much as they wanted. Table tennis, games… even the snack stand."

[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
**時雨:** "That was nice. …Brother, why don't we hang out together without any siblings around for once?"  
**嘉祥:** "Sure, but what are we doing?"  
**時雨:** "I heard there's a karaoke room."  
**嘉祥:** "Karaoke… I haven’t been in ages since high school. Can you sing, Shigure?"  
**時雨:** "I participated in choir when I was little, so I can manage."  

*That’s how it went.*  
**時雨:** "Then, with all my feelings for Brother…"  
As she started singing, the atmosphere completely changed.  
**時雨:** "~♪"  
**嘉祥:** "...Wow."  
**時雨:** "Haa~, I haven't used a big voice like that in ages."  
**嘉祥:** "You're amazing!"  

Frankly speaking, it was professional-level. I showered her with applause without hesitation.

[アズキ]: 「嘉祥の今までのことって？」

reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Because you didn't put on outside shoes. That's not normal for a walk this late at night, don't you think?」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」
[Azuki]: 「Are the convenience store sweets still what's buggin' you?」
[Kashou]: 「No, no. I'm good on that front now.」
[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」
ModelAnswer:
[Azuki]: "No indoor shoes, huh? That's not normal, is it, to be out in the middle of the night like this?"
[Kashou]: "I'm sorry… I really just needed a change of pace."
[Azuki]: "So your problem is still about that convenience store sweets thing?"
[Kashou]: "No, no, that's all taken care of now."
[Kashou]: "It’s just… thinking back on everything, wondering what it is I’m missing in life."
[Azuki]: "What have you been doing since graduating, Kashou?"
[Kashou]: "...After graduating university, I went to France for a study abroad program."
[Kashou]: "I felt like inheriting the family business after graduation was somehow… unsatisfying. I wanted to broaden my horizons."
[Kashou]: "Just so you know… it’s not that I dislike Minaduki's wagashi."

[Kashou]: 「In my mentor's shop, I ate those impressively delicious Western-style sweets and saw the smiles of the patrons there.」

[Kashou]: 「I pleaded with my mentor to take me as their apprentice... and learned the ways of Western confectioneries from them.」
[Kashou]: 「When my study abroad was nearing an end... my mentor told me, 'I've already taught you everything.'」
[Kashou]: 「Although, personally, I don't feel as though I've matched my mentor's distinct flavor in the slightest...」

reference_answer:

Even now, every time I remember what happened that night, the thoughts start brewing in my head.
But unless I can get my dad to recognize my own flavor, I'll be stuck with this nagging sensation in my heart forever.
I'm also making the catgirls worry more than they should over me.

However, unless I make my father acknowledge the taste of my cakes, this bitter feeling will never go away. It's also making the cats worry too much.

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「ん？」

メイプルは指先で、俺の口元をなでてきた。
なめらかで、艶やかで、それでいてやわらかな指だった。
メイプルがぬぐった生クリームを舐める。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, sorry, Maple. I wasn't paying attention.」
[Maple]: 「Talk about being rude.」
[Maple]: 「What with that scary expression and grumbling... I thought you turned into a dog for a moment.」
[Kashou]: 「Was that really the expression on my face?」
[Maple]: 「At the very least, it's not the kind of face that you'd make when eating good cake.」
[Kashou]: 「Ah, yeah...」
I'm not going to refute that I wasn't in that state of mind.
I pat my own face down.
[Maple]: 「Tee hee...」
[Kashou]: 「Hm?」
[Maple]: 「You have cream on your cheek.」
Maple uses her fingertip to stroke around my mouth.
Her fingers are smooth and elegant, yet still supple at the same time.
Maple licks the whipped cream she wiped off.
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Sorry, sorry, Maple. I didn't notice."  
[Maple]: "You were being rude."  
[Maple]: "You looked so scared and whimpering… I thought you'd turned into a dog?"  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Was I really that scary?"  
[Maple]: "Not when you're eating delicious cake, that's for sure."  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Ah, yeah…"  
He didn’t deny it. He stroked his own face.  
[Maple]: "Hehe…"  
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Huh?"  
[Maple]: "There’s cream on your cheek."  

Maple traced the corner of his mouth with her fingertip.  
Smooth, glossy, and soft—her fingers were gentle.  
She licked up the whipped cream she wiped off him.

reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「Huh...?」

[Kashou]: 「I absolutely hate feeling that way, but... I'm aware of the fact that I've been losing my composure.」
[Kashou]: 「And I'm afraid that eventually... even though it's all in my head, I won't be able to keep myself in check and I'll end up pushing you all away from me...」
[Kashou]: 「I'm so grateful to have you all, but I'm having more moments where I feel like I want to be by myself...」
[Kashou]: 「Even though I really hate that idea...」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry. Even now... I know in my mind that I shouldn't be saying that, and yet... Khh...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Ungh, sniffle... Waah~」
[Kashou]: 「I'm sorry...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Poor Kashou-san~」
ModelAnswer:

[Kaishou]: "That's what I hate most... I know I'm losing my composure."

[Kaishou]: "I'm grateful for all of you. But the time I want to be alone is increasing..."  
[Kaishou]: "And that's what I hate most..."

[Kaishou]: "I'm sorry..."  
[Cinnamon]: "Kaishou-san, you're so cute!"

Question:
[シナモン]: 「だって、苦しいから～……苦しすぎて、だから……言いたくないことも、口から出ちゃうって……」

reference_answer:
[Cinnamon]: 「I mean, you're in pain~... You're in so much pain, and that's why... you ended up saying what you didn't want to say...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Unghh... Not being able to say what you want to say... and saying what you don't want to say...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Either way... sniffle... I understand... Unghh... It's so sad~... It's so very saaad~...!」
[Kashou]: 「Cinnamon... I'm sorry...」
[Cinnamon]: 「D-Don't apologize... please. You aren't in the wrong here, Kashou-saaan~...!」
[Cinnamon]: 「Kashou-san, youuu... sniffle... you can let it out and cry~...! It is sad, after all~」
[Kashou]: 「I...」
I see. So this is sad?
My lack of skills is sad... The disappointment of my hard work going unrewarded is sad...
[Maple]: 「Khh... It makes me want to cry, too...」
ModelAnswer:
[Cinnamon]: "Because it hurts... so much that I can't even say what I want to say... and then things I don't want to say come out of my mouth..."
[Ugh...] "I want to say something... but I also feel like I can't say what I want to say... and I end up saying the things I *don't* want to say..."

[Both]: "Guh..." (sniffling)

[Kashou]: "Cinnamon... I'm sorry..."
[Cinnamon]: "No, don't apologize. It's not your fault, Kashou-san!~"
[Cinnamon]: "Kashou-san... guh... you can cry if you want to~. Because you're sad, after all~."

[Kashou]: "...I..."

So this is sadness.

My lack of ability... my efforts going unrewarded... disappointment...

[Maple]: "Ugh... even I'm getting teary-eyed..."

[Kaishou]: "Maybe… but right now…"

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「なにやってるんだ、時雨……？」
[時雨]: 「……見つかってしまいましたか。兄様」
[時雨]: 「現地の人たちに、完璧に溶けこんだつもりだったのですが」
[嘉祥]: 「いや……パリでも、そんな貴族みたいなドレス姿は、そうそう見かけないんだが……」
パリは石畳の道が多く、階段を使うことも多く、ハイヒールは転倒の危険がある。女性でもスニーカーや革靴を履く者が多い。
そして、スリムなジーンズをはいている女性は多く、スカート姿の女性は珍しい。
服の色は黒か白だ。ベージュや柄物のアウターを着ているのは、おおねむ観光客だった。
[時雨]: 「残念です……完璧だと思ったのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、まぁ……その格好も似合ってるから、いいんじゃないか？」
reference_answer:
Yeah, as if! Not even I would mistake someone else for my little sister.
[Kashou]: 「What are you doing here, Shigure...?」
[Shigure]: 「...So, you ended up finding me, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「I was trying to perfectly blend in with the local people.」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Even in Paris, you don't really see people running around with such an aristocratic-looking dress.」
Paris is full of stone-paved roads and you're often climbing stairs, so wearing high-heels is risky. Even the majority of ladies wear sneakers or leather shoes.
Also, most girls wear slim jeans, so girls in skirts are rare.
Their clothes are usually black or white. Mostly anyone wearing beige or patterned outerwear is a tourist.
[Shigure]: 「How unfortunate... I thought it was perfect...」
[Kashou]: 「Uh, well... Your outfit looks nice on you, so it's fine, right?」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "No way! There's no way I'd mistake my little sister for anyone else."  
**Kashou:** "What are you doing, Shigure…?"  
**Shigure:** "...You found me, Brother."  
**Shigure:** "I thought I had completely blended in with the locals."  
**Kashou:** "No... even in Paris, you don't see people dressed like that—like some noblewoman."  

Paris has many cobblestone streets and lots of stairs; high heels are dangerous. Even women often wear sneakers or loafers.  
And there are a lot of women wearing slim jeans; skirted outfits are rare.  
The colors of clothing are mostly black or white. People in beige or patterned outerwear were probably tourists from Oohane (a fictional place).  

**Shigure:** "That's unfortunate… I thought it was perfect…"  
**Kashou:** "Well, yeah... but that outfit suits you, so maybe it's okay?"
