[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それに……留学していた頃は……兄様がずっと戻ってこない可能性も、ありましたから」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、なるほど」
俺が洋菓子の道に進んだことで、父親との仲は冷えこんでいた。
留学が終わっても、パリに留まるという可能性も、充分にあったわけだ。
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、日本で店を開くことは、決めていたんだが……」
[時雨]: 「何か理由があるのでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり……親父から逃げた、なんて思われたくなかった。俺にも意地がある」
[嘉祥]: 「あと、師匠に言われたんだよ。ちゃんと父親と話し合ったほうがいい。日本に戻りなさい、って」
[時雨]: 「師匠様が……」
[嘉祥]: 「今では、師匠の味を、俺の生まれ故郷の街に伝えるのも、けっこう意味のあることだと思ってる」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Also... when you were still studying abroad... there was a chance that you would never come back to Japan.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I see now.」
By going down the path of a Western sweets maker, my relationship with my dad soured.
Even when my study abroad was over, there was still a big possibility that I would stay in Paris.
[Kashou]: 「Well, by that time, I made up my mind to open my shop in Japan...」
[Shigure]: 「Was there any reason behind that decision?」
[Kashou]: 「Well... I didn't want people to think that I ran away from Dad. I have my pride.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, my mentor told me to. She said that I should talk it out with my dad and return to Japan.」
[Shigure]: 「Your mentor...」
[Kashou]: 「Nowadays, I think that was really important in bringing my mentor's distinct flavor over to the town I was born and raised in.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Besides... when I was studying abroad, there was also the possibility that my older brother wouldn't come back."  
**Kashou:** "Ah, I see."  

My relationship with my father had grown distant since I chose the confectionery path. Even after finishing my studies, staying in Paris was a very real option.  
**Kashou:** "I'd decided to open a shop in Japan..."  
**Shigure:** "Is there some reason for that?"  
**Kashou:** "Well... I didn't want people to think I ran away from Dad. I have my pride."  
**Kashou:** "Plus, Master told me to properly talk with my father. He said I should come back to Japan."  
**Shigure:** "Master..."  
**Kashou:** "Now, I even think it's pretty meaningful to spread Master's taste in the town where I was born."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[時雨]: 「はい！」
[嘉祥]: 「さて、そろそろ行こうか。クレープは入りそうかい？」
[時雨]: 「もちろんです、兄様！　はむ！」
[嘉祥]: 「気をつけろよ、時雨。パリは危険な街だからな」
[時雨]: 「え？　は、はい……」
[嘉祥]: 「油断してると、あっという間に体重が増えるぞ。美味しい物がいっぱいあるからな！」
[時雨]: 「ひぇ……」
[嘉祥]: 「ごくり……」
お昼近く――営業時間を待って、俺は店の前まで来た。
約束は取り付けてあるとはいえ……やっぱり、緊張する。
[時雨]: 「まぁ、素敵です！　ここが、本家ラ・ソレイユなのですね、兄様？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Indeed!」
[Kashou]: 「Now then, it's about time we get going. Got room for crepes?」
[Shigure]: 「Of course, Nii-sama! Nom!」
[Kashou]: 「Be careful, Shigure. Paris is a dangerous city.」
[Shigure]: 「Huh? Y-Yes, I will...」
[Kashou]: 「If you don't keep up your guard, you'll end up gaining weight before you know it. There's a whole lot of tasty things to be had here!」
[Shigure]: 「Eep...」
[Kashou]: 「Gulp...」
Nearly lunchtime— After waiting for normal business hours, I find myself in front of the shop.
I know that I've made plans, but... I'm still getting nervous.
[Shigure]: 「My, it's splendid! So this is the original La Soleil, isn't it, Nii-sama?!」
ModelAnswer:
[Sugure]: "Yes!"
[Kashou]: "Alright, shall we go soon? Are you excited about the crepes?"
[Sugure]: "Of course, Onii-sama! Mmm!"
[Kashou]: "Watch out, Sugure. Paris is a dangerous city."
[Sugure]: "Eh? Y-yes..."
[Kashou]: "If you're not careful, your weight will increase in no time. There are so many delicious things there!"
[Sugure]: "Yikes..."
[Kashou]: "Gulp..."

Near noon—waiting for the business hours to start, I arrived in front of the shop.
Even though we have a reservation... I'm still nervous.
[Sugure]: "Well, this is wonderful! So this *is* the main La Soleil, Onii-sama?"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[時雨]: 「兄様から何度か話だけは伺っていましたが……とうとう訪れることができました」
[時雨]: 「私にとっては、聖地。まさに、聖地巡礼の気分です」
[嘉祥]: 「……そういうものか？」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は留学先が近いこともあって、懐かしい気分だよ。帰ってきたって感じだ」
[時雨]: 「兄様の留学先、この近くなのですね」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、この通りを数分歩いた先だな」
[時雨]: 「だとすると、本家ラ・ソレイユのお客さんは、学生さんが多いのですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「うーん……学生のお客さんもいるけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「やっぱり、主婦が一番多いかな。子連れのお母さんも、よく来るよ」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You've told me about this place so many times in the past, but... I can't believe I'm finally getting to visit.」
[Shigure]: 「This is sacred ground to me. This whole thing feels like a pilgrimage.」
[Kashou]: 「...Does it?」
[Kashou]: 「Where I studied abroad is close to here, so it's got a lot of nostalgia for me. Kind of like I'm back for the first time in a while.」
[Shigure]: 「Ah, your old school is nearby, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, a few minutes down this street, in fact.」
[Shigure]: 「In that case, are a lot of the customers here at the original La Soleil students?」
[Kashou]: 「Hmm... They have their fair share of students, but...」
[Kashou]: 「I'd say housewives are the biggest group of customers. A lot of mothers come with their kids, too.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "I've heard about it from my brother several times, but... I finally got to visit."  
**Shigure:** "For me, this is a holy place. It's like a pilgrimage!"  
**Kashou:** "...Is that so?"  
**Kashou:** "Since my study abroad location was nearby, it feels nostalgic. Like coming home."  
**Shigure:** "So your study abroad location is near here?"  
**Kashou:** "Yeah, just a few minutes down this street."  
**Shigure:** "Then, are there many students at the main La Soleil?"  
**Kashou:** "Hmm... There are some student customers..."  
**Kashou:** "But still, housewives are the most common. Mothers with kids often come too."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「フランスでは、食事のときにケーキを食べるのは、ごく普通のことだ」
[嘉祥]: 「一般家庭でも、夕飯は――サラダ、スープ、パン、魚料理、肉料理、チーズ、デザート……みたいに出すからな」
どのくらい皿数を出すかは、各家庭によるが。
[時雨]: 「毎日がフランス料理ですね」
[嘉祥]: 「だから、ほとんど毎日のようにケーキを食べる人も、そう珍しくないんだよ」
[時雨]: 「ふむふむ……なるほど……」
[時雨]: 「なんだか、不思議な感じがします。ご家庭でコース料理だなんて」
[嘉祥]: 「いやいや……日本の一般的な家庭料理だって、別の国の人からしたら、まるで懐石料理だよ」
[嘉祥]: 「お茶、お米、味噌汁、惣菜、肉魚……使っている皿の数には、大差ないだろ？」
[時雨]: 「言われてみれば……！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「But here in France, it's extremely common to eat cake at dinner time.」
[Kashou]: 「Even when it comes to normal families, dinner usually goes: Salad, soup, bread, seafood, meat, cheese, desert.」
How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.
[Shigure]: 「Every day is French cuisine, then.」
[Kashou]: 「So, yeah, it's not that rare to see most people eating a cake almost every day.」
[Shigure]: 「Mm-hmm, mm-hmm... I see.」
[Shigure]: 「I still find it rather curious that households partake in full course meals.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」
[Kashou]: 「Tea, white rice, miso soup, entrees, meat, and fish... There's not much difference between the amount of dishes they use.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh, when you put it that way...!」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashō:** "In France, eating cake during meals is perfectly normal."  
**Kashō:** "Even in ordinary homes, dinner might include—salad, soup, bread, fish, meat dishes, cheese, dessert… something like that."  
The number of plates varies from household to household.  

**Shigure:** "So every day is French cuisine?"  
**Kashō:** "That’s why eating cake almost daily isn’t so unusual."  
**Shigure:** "Hmm, I see…"  
**Shigure:** "It feels strange somehow. A full-course meal in a home…!"  

**Kashō:** "No way… even Japanese everyday meals would look like *kaiseki* (traditional multi-course dinner) to someone from another country."  
**Kashō:** "Tea, rice, miso soup, side dishes, meat and fish… the number of plates used isn’t that different, right?"  
**Shigure:** "Now that you mention it…!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[？？？]: 「ひっ！？」
[時雨]: 「なんて澄んだ瞳！　そして、艶やかな毛なみ！　耳の形なんて完璧の完璧です！！」
[？？？]: 「あ……う……」
[時雨]: 「ふっさふさの尻尾も、素敵です！　この形……この色……チンチラペルシャですね！？」
[？？？]: 「……は、はい」
[時雨]: 「あああ、初めて見ました！　こんなに可愛らしいネコだったなんて！」
[？？？]: 「……あ、ありがとうございます。あなたも……素敵です。そんな綺麗な黒髪、初めて見ました」
[時雨]: 「ああ……兄様！　聞きましたか！？」
[嘉祥]: 「うん、よく躾けられた、素晴らしいネコだな」
[？？？]: 「そ、そんなことは……」
[時雨]: 「ああ、こんな子がウチに来てくれたら、どれだけ素敵でしょうか……！」
reference_answer:
[???]: 「Eep?!」
[Shigure]: 「Such bright and vivid eyes! And that glossy pelt! Even your ears are absolutely, positively perfect!」
[???]: 「Aah... Uhh...」
[Shigure]: 「Your soft and fluffy tail is also divine! Given the shape... and the color... might you be a Chinchilla Persian?!」
[???]: 「...Y-Yes.」
[Shigure]: 「Aah, I've never seen a catgirl this adorable before in my life!」
[???]: 「...Th-Thank you very much. You're... quite lovely yourself. I've never seen such beautiful black hair before.」
[Shigure]: 「Aah... Nii-sama! Did you hear her?!」
[Kashou]: 「Yup, she's a wonderful, well-trained catgirl.」
[???]: 「O-Oh, please, don't...」
[Shigure]: 「Aah, how lovely it would be if this girl were to come home with us...!」
ModelAnswer:
[?? ??]: "Eek!?"
[Shigure]: "What clear eyes! And such glossy fur! The shape of your ears is perfect, absolutely perfect!!"
[?? ??]: "...Ah...um..."
[Shigure]: "And that fluffy tail is lovely too! That shape...that color...a chinchilla Persian, I think?!"
[?? ??]: "...Y-yes."
[Shigure]: "Aaaaah, this is the first time I've seen such a cute cat!"
[?? ??]: "...Ah, thank you. You're...nice too. Such beautiful black hair, I've never seen anything like it."
[Shigure]: "Ah...Brother! Did you hear?!"
[Kashou]: "Yeah, well-trained and wonderful cat."
[?? ??]: "T-that's not what I meant..."
[Shigure]: "Oh, how wonderful if a kitten like this came to live with us...!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「あっ、私、水無月時雨と申します」
[時雨]: 「や、約束もないのに、ついてきてしまって……もちろん、ご迷惑はおかけしませんので！」
[ベニエ]: 「時雨……？　じゃあ、嘉祥の妹の……？」
[時雨]: 「は、はい」
[嘉祥]: 「申し訳ありません、師匠……勝手についてきてしまって」
[ベニエ]: 「よく来たわね、時雨……！　ずっと会いたいと思っていたわ」
[時雨]: 「あ……私もです、ベニエさん。兄様ったら、帰国したあと師匠様の話ばかりするものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「あら、そうなの？　嘉祥は、フランスでは妹の話ばかりしていたわ」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、そ、そんなことはないでしょう……？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Oh, I am Shigure Minaduki.」
[Shigure]: 「I-I'm here unannounced since I tagged along... but, of course, I will make sure that I am of no inconvenience!」
[Beignet]: 「Shigure...? Then, you're Kashou's little sister...?」
[Shigure]: 「Y-Yes, ma'am.」
[Kashou]: 「My apologies, Mentor... She followed me of her own accord.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm so glad you've come, Shigure...! I've always wanted to meet you!」
[Shigure]: 「Oh... As have I, Beignet-san. Nii-sama couldn't stop talking about his prized mentor after coming back from overseas, after all.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh my, is that so? Kashou couldn't stop talking about his lovely little sister while in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Th-That isn't true, though...?」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Ah, I'm Minaduki Shigure."  
**Shigure:** "Oh, I didn't even make a promise, but you came along anyway… Of course, it's no trouble at all!"  
**Beignet:** "Shigure…? So, Kashou's younger sister?"  
**Shigure:** "Y-yes."  
**Kashou:** "Sorry, Master… For coming without permission."  
**Beignet:** "You came just in time, Shigure! I've been wanting to see you!"  
**Shigure:** "Ah… me too, Beignet-san. My brother keeps talking about you non-stop since he got back from abroad."  
**Beignet:** "Oh really? Kashou was always talking about his sister when we were in France."  
**Kashou:** "Eh, th-that's not true…"  

*(Note: The last line is left untranslated as it's a short, casual denial.)*

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[フレーズ]: 「わかりました……それじゃあ、看板を出すのを手伝ってください。そのあと、窓ガラスを拭きます」
[時雨]: 「はい！」
[ベニエ]: 「私も、準備をしないと」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も手伝います！」
[ベニエ]: 「おやおや、何を言っているのかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「え？」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥の場合は手伝いじゃなく、貴方の役目よ？　２日間だけでも、滞在するからには働いてもらうわ。前と同じように」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……もちろんです！！」
何年も働いていた店だ。物の位置も、段取りも、ほとんど変わっていない。全て覚えている。
俺は戸惑うことなく、開店準備に取りかかった。
ショーケースの中を拭き、ケーキを並べる。
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「Very well... In that case, I would appreciate it if you helped me bring out the sandwich sign. Afterward, we'll clean the windows.」
[Shigure]: 「Right!」
[Beignet]: 「I should get things ready myself.」
[Kashou]: 「I'll help you with that!」
[Beignet]: 「Oh my, what are you talking about?」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」
[Beignet]: 「This isn't going to be 'helping out', this is going to be your 'role'. You're only here for two days, but I'm going to have you work since you're here. Just like before.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh... Of course!」
I worked in this shop for years. The location of items, the preparations—almost nothing has changed. I remember everything.
I get started on preparing for opening without any indecision.
I wipe off the glass showcase and line up the cakes.
ModelAnswer:
[フレーズ]: "Understood… then, please help me set up the sign. After that, I'll clean the windows."  
[時雨]: "Yes!"  
[ベニエ]: "I should prepare too."  
[嘉祥]: "I’ll help you!"  
[ベニエ]: "Oh my, what are you saying?"  
[嘉祥]: "Huh?"  
[ベニエ]: "In your case, it’s not helping but your duty, isn’t it? Since you’re staying for two days, I expect you to work. Just like before."  
[嘉祥]: "Ah… of course!!"  

It's a shop I've worked at for years. The placement of things, the workflow—almost nothing has changed. I remember everything.  
Without hesitation, I began preparing for opening. Wiping down the display case, arranging the cakes.

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「変わり映えがないでしょう」
[嘉祥]: 「とんでもない。俺にとっては、今もこのケーキが完璧で究極の目標です」
[嘉祥]: 「……俺……父親にケーキを食べてもらおうと思ったんです」
[ベニエ]: 「そう……どうだったかしら？」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、父親は食べるまでもないって」
[ベニエ]: 「…………そう」
[嘉祥]: 「そして、俺の料理には芯がないそうです。軸とか核とか主って意味だと思うんですけど」
自分でも理解していない概念をフランス語で説明するのは難しかった。
[嘉祥]: 「師匠……もう一度、俺に修行させてもらえませんか？」
[ベニエ]: 「私にも、嘉祥のお父さんの言う芯の意味はわかりません」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Well, nothing much has changed.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sell yourself short. These cakes are perfect, and they're the ultimate goal for me.」
[Kashou]: 「...I... tried to get dad to eat my cake.」
[Beignet]: 「I see... And how did that go?」
[Kashou]: 「Dad said 'he didn't need to eat it'.」
[Beignet]: 「...I see.」
[Kashou]: 「He also said that my cooking lacks a 'core'. I think he means a 'main part', like an 'axis' or a 'nucleus' in other things.」
It's hard trying to explain a concept I don't comprehend myself into French.
[Kashou]: 「Mentor... Will you allow me to train under you once again?」
[Beignet]: 「I'm not sure what this 'core' your father speaks of is, either.」
ModelAnswer:
**Beignet:** "It's not very impressive, is it?"  
**Kashō:** "Not at all. To me, this cake is perfect and the ultimate goal."  
**Kashō:** "...I... I wanted my father to eat this cake."  
**Beignet:** "Oh? How was it?"  
**Kashō:** "But he said it wasn't even worth eating."  
**Beignet:** "…I see."  
**Kashō:** "And apparently, there's no 'core' in my cooking. I think that means axis or center or something like that."  

It was difficult to explain the concept in French since I don’t fully understand it myself.  
**Kashō:** "Master... Can you train me again?"  
**Beignet:** "I don't even know what your father meant by 'core'."

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そう思います。父親は頑固で口下手だけど……認めたくないからって嘘を言うような人じゃない」
[ベニエ]: 「説明しなかったことに、意味がある。それは理解できているのね？」
[嘉祥]: 「ええ、たぶん」
[ベニエ]: 「なら、私には教えることができない。それも理解できる？」
[嘉祥]: 「はい……」
おそらく、俺には足りないものがある。
そして、父親と師匠は理解している。
しかし、言葉で説明できるようなものではない。
[嘉祥]: 「ううぅ……」
悩んでしまい、また思考がぐるぐると頭の中を回った。
[ベニエ]: 「私は役に立たないと言ったでしょう？　今のうちに国へ帰る？」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、いや！　何かを見つけなければ、帰れません」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「That's what I think, too. Dad is hardheaded and terrible with words, but... he's not the kind of person to lie just because he doesn't approve of something.」
[Beignet]: 「There is some meaning behind him not explaining himself. You realize that, at least?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, somewhat.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, I can't teach you anything. You realize that as well?」
[Kashou]: 「Yes...」
I'm guess there's something I'm missing.
Something dad and Mentor both understand.
However, it's not something that can be explained in words.
[Kashou]: 「Unghh...」
I find myself lost with my thoughts running around in circles in my head.
[Beignet]: 「I told you that I wouldn't do you any good, didn't I? Why not get back to Japan while you still can?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no! I cannot go back until I find something—anything.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashō]: "I think so. Father is stubborn and not good with words, but… he's the type to lie just because he doesn't want to admit it."  
[Beignet]: "There's a reason you didn't explain things. You understand that?"  
[Kashō]: "Yeah, probably."  
[Beignet]: "Then I can't teach you what you need to know. Understand that too?"  
[Kashō]: "Yes…"  
Probably, there's something I'm missing. And Father and Master understand it. But it’s not something you can explain in words.  
[Kashō]: "Ugh…!"  
He worried again, his thoughts swirling in his head.

[Beignet]: 「A single motivated person can cross a river, but a person who motivates many can build a bridge.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, maybe Shigure is the type to help build bridges.」

[Kashou]: 「Huh?! Me, too...?!」

[Beignet]: "One determined person can cross a river, but one who inspires everyone to act can build a bridge over it."
[Kaisho]: "Indeed, Shigure is the type to build bridges."

[Kashou]: 「Honestly, when I was helping with the shop today, I did kind of ask myself, 'Should I really be doing this right now?'」
[Kashou]: 「I thought, 'I should be baking the cake that'll satisfy my dad before Christmas'.」
[Kashou]: 「But, as I worked through the day, I kind of started to remember the old days.」
[Kashou]: 「My desire from when I first started off to make Western sweets had resuscitated.」
ModelAnswer:
That cake was a new creation, and it was the first time I'd tasted that flavor—but there's no doubt it was Master’s taste…  
It felt so fresh yet nostalgic.  

**Kashō:** "...Doesn't this make me feel like I've come to this town just for this cake?"  
**Beignet:** "Are you calmed down a little?"  
**Kashō:** "I don’t know... Was it that bad?"  
**Beignet:** "You had the face of a lost kitten."  
**Kashō:** "I’m mortified!"  
**Kashō:** "Honestly, when I was helping out at the shop, I sometimes wondered if this was even worth doing."  
**Kashō:** "I have to make a cake that convinces my father by Christmas—right?"  
**Kashō:** "But while working here, I remembered some of those old feelings..."  
**Kashō:** "The initial passion for making Western sweets came flooding back."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「……私は、嘉祥のお父さんではないから、わからないわね。そうかもしれないし、違うのかもしれない」
[ベニエ]: 「言葉というのは、言った本人にすら、本当の意味がわからないこともある」
[ベニエ]: 「１００人が受け取れば、１００通りの解釈があるのが、言葉というものだから」
[ベニエ]: 「大切なのは言葉ではなくて……」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……少し話しすぎたわね」
[ベニエ]: 「長旅のうえに、ずっと働いて疲れたでしょう。シャワーを浴びて、早めに寝るといいわ」
[ベニエ]: 「あ……うっかりしていたわ。空き部屋はあるけれど、ベッドは嘉祥が使っていたものしか空いてないの」
[ベニエ]: 「一緒に使ってもらってもいいかしら？」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「...I'm not your father, so I don't know. Your hunch could be right, or you it could be wrong.」
[Beignet]: 「There's also a chance that not even he himself knows the true meaning behind what he said.」
[Beignet]: 「Words are like that. You give them to a hundred different people, and they'll interpret them a hundred different ways.」
[Beignet]: 「What's important isn't the words. It's...」
[Beignet]: 「No... I've said too much.」
[Beignet]: 「The day's work on top of the long trip must have you tired, no? You should shower up and hurry to bed.」
[Beignet]: 「Oh... How silly of me to forget. There are empty rooms here, but the only one with a free bed is the one that Kashou used before.」
[Beignet]: 「Would the two of you mind sharing?」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "...I'm not Kasha's father, so I don't know. Maybe it is like that, or maybe it isn't."  
[Beignet]: "Words can mean something different even to the person who said them."  
[Beignet]: "Because a hundred people receiving them will have a hundred interpretations—that’s what words are."  
[Beignet]: "What's important isn’t the words themselves..."  
[Beignet]: "No... I talked too much."  
[Beignet]: "You've been on a long journey and worked hard. Take a shower, and go to bed early."  
[Beignet]: "Ah... I almost forgot. There are empty rooms, but all the beds that aren't taken were Kasha's."  
[Beignet]: "Would it be alright if you shared one?"

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「ダメよ。陽が落ちてから出歩くなんて、危ないもの」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだな。大きなベッドだから、大丈夫だろう」
[時雨]: 「…………えっ！？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨が嫌なら、話は別だが」
[時雨]: 「は、はわ……はわわ……兄様と……！？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……私、幸せすぎて……気絶しそうです」
[ベニエ]: 「……本当に大丈夫なのよね、嘉祥？」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨はときどきこうなりますが、絶対に大丈夫です。俺を信用してください、師匠」
[ベニエ]: 「うふふ……なら、安心ね」
[ベニエ]: 「そうなの……時雨はこういう子なのね。会えてよかったわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「That will not do. Walking around after sundown could be dangerous.」
[Kashou]: 「That's right. It's a big bed, so we'll manage.」
[Shigure]: 「...Huh?!」
[Kashou]: 「But if you don't want to, that's a different story.」
[Shigure]: 「H-Hah-wah.... Hah-wah-wah... With Nii-sama...?!」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I am in such bliss... I think I might pass out.」
[Beignet]: 「...You're sure you'll be all right, Kashou?」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure just gets like this sometimes. I'm positive we'll be just fine. Please, believe me, Mentor.」
[Beignet]: 「Tee hee hee... One less worry, then.」
[Beignet]: 「I see... So, this is the type of girl Shigure is. I'm glad I've gotten to meet her.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "No way. Going out after the sun sets is dangerous."  
[Kashō]: "True, but it's a big bed, so I'll be fine."  
[Shigure]: "...Eh!?"  
[Kashō]: "If you don't like it, that changes things."  
[Shigure]: "H-huh... h-huh... with my brother...!?"  
[Shigure]: "Ugh... I'm too happy... I think I'll faint."  
[Beignet]: "...Are you really okay with this, Kashō?"  
[Kashō]: "Shigure gets like this sometimes, but I'm definitely fine. Trust me, Master."  
[Beignet]: "Hehe... then it's settled."  
[Beignet]: "I see... Shigure is the type of girl who'd say that. Nice to meet you."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「きっと頻繁に手を入れているのでしょうね。部屋は使わなければ、悪くなるものですから」
[嘉祥]: 「言われてみれば……」
[時雨]: 「毎日のように窓を開けたり、埃を払わないと、すぐカビ臭くなります」
[嘉祥]: 「そういうものか？」
[時雨]: 「実家にある兄様の部屋は、私が毎日のように手入れしていますから万全です」
[時雨]: 「窓を開けて、空気を入れ換えて、机を乾拭きし、ベッドの寝心地を確かめています」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、そうか」
ベッドの寝心地は、毎日チェックする必要が……？
[時雨]: 「たぶんベニエさんは、また兄様が来るのをずっと待っていたのだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am to assume that she frequently tidies it up. Rooms are meant to be used, after all.」
[Kashou]: 「Now that you mention it...」
[Shigure]: 「Unless you open the windows and dust almost daily, the smell of mildew will instantly grow.」
[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」
[Shigure]: 「I tidy up your room back at home almost every day, so it is spotless.」
[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, I see.」
Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?
[Shigure]: 「It might be that Beignet-san had been waiting for your return this entire time, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh. Maybe...」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "You must be touching it often. If you don't use a room, things will get worse."  
**Kashou:** "Now that you mention it…"  
**Shigure:** "Every day, I open the windows and dust to keep it from smelling moldy."  
**Kashou:** "So that's how it is?"  
**Shigure:** "My brother's room at my parents' house is in perfect condition because I take care of it every single day."  
**Shigure:** "I open the windows, refresh the air, wipe down the desk, and check the bed's comfort."  
**Kashou:** "Oh… right."  
The bed needs checking daily…?  

**Shigure:** "Probably Beignet-san was just waiting for your brother to come back forever."  
**Kashou:** "I see…"

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「明日も早い。シャワーを浴びて、もう寝るとしよう」
[時雨]: 「えっ、一緒にシャワーですか！？　そ、それは……こ、心の準備が……完了です」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなわけないだろ。早く浴びてきなさい」
[時雨]: 「はーい」
[時雨]: 「にゃ～お♪　にゃお？　にゃおぅん」
[嘉祥]: 「時雨が病気だ、すぐ病院へ」
[時雨]: 「すみません。嬉しすぎて、つい人語を忘れてしまいました」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、今日は、お疲れさまだったな」
[時雨]: 「もったいないお言葉です。私が勝手についてきたのに」
[嘉祥]: 「いいさ……俺だって勝手に来たんだ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Tomorrow's another early day. Let's shower up and get to bed.」
[Shigure]: 「Huh? We're showering together?! W-Well... m-my body and mind... are ready.」
[Kashou]: 「Of course not together. Hurry and take yours first.」
[Shigure]: 「Right away!」
[Shigure]: 「Nya~oh♪ Nyaoh? Nya-ohm.」
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, you're sick. You need a hospital ASAP.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I am just so thrilled that I forgot human speech for a second.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, you did work hard today.」
[Shigure]: 「You are too kind. Especially considering I tagged along of my own accord.」
[Kashou]: 「Don't sweat it. I came here of my own accord too, so we're in the same boat.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashou:** "Early tomorrow. I'll take a shower and go to bed."  
**Shigure:** "Huh? Shower together!? Th-that's… I'm not ready yet…"  
**Kashou:** "There's no way you're ready. Hurry up and get in!"  
**Shigure:** "Okay~"  
**Shigure:** "Nyaa~o! Nyao? Nyauuu."  
**Kashou:** "You're sick, Shigure. Take me to the hospital."  
**Shigure:** "Sorry. I got so happy I forgot my human voice."  
**Kashou:** "Well, you worked hard today."  
**Shigure:** "That's a waste of words. You came on your own too!"  
**Kashou:** "Whatever… I did it on my own too."

俺に見せ、味わわせるために、あれを……
reference_answer:

She made all that to present for me to taste...
ModelAnswer:

[Kashou]: "...Cinnamon's a little different, isn't she?"

To show me, to let me taste it...

Question:

[Shigure]: 「Hah... Hah.. Nii-sama, are you already asleep?」

**Shigure:** "Should we have hired a pet sitter after all?"

Question:

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Uh, yes.」

[Shigure]: 「...Well, I wish I was a catgirl.」

[Shigure]: 「True. If I were a catgirl, then I wouldn't be your sibling...」
[Shigure]: 「Gasp! Maybe you should be the catBOY instead!」
ModelAnswer:

[Shigure]: "True, if I were a cat, I wouldn't be your brother's sister anymore..."
[Shigure]: "Hah! Maybe you'd like that, Brother!"

[Kashou]: "What happened, Sugure!? Did you catch a cold?!"
[Sugure]: "N-no, I'm fine... It's just that... Onii-sama was too amazing..."
[Kashou]: "I don't think I did anything... You didn't do anything either, right?"
[Sugure]: "...Yes... From my side, nothing... Not even a single finger touched me."
[Kashou]: "Well, at least take a shower. You're sweating like crazy. The sheets are soaked."
[Sugure]: "I'm glad it was just sweat... I almost turned someone else's bed into a prop for a splatter movie."
[Kashou]: "Nosebleed...?"
Sugure sat up and straightened her rumpled nightgown before staggering towards the shower room.

[Shigure]: 「...I feel as though the world changed colors, all of creation shined radiantly, and I emerged reborn.」

[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san, are you all right? You seem somewhat tired...」
[Shigure]: 「Of course, I'm just fine, Fraise.」
[Shigure]: 「...By the way, Beignet-san... There is something I would like to ask you.」

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうが長く働いてたはずなのに、フレーズのほうが手際がいいくらいだもんな」
[フレーズ]: 「嘉祥さんは細かいところまで丁寧です。見習いたいです」
[嘉祥]: 「そうかな？」
[フレーズ]: 「ときどき、ぼーっとしてますけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……」
[フレーズ]: 「今の嘉祥さんは悩んでいて、考えなくちゃいけないことが、いっぱいあるんでしょうね……」
[フレーズ]: 「パティシエールから、少しだけ事情を聞きました」
[嘉祥]: 「仕事中に、ぼんやりしていい理由にはならないけど」
[フレーズ]: 「そのぶんは、わたしが働きます」
[嘉祥]: 「なんと言ったらいいか……」
申し訳ないような、情けないような。もちろん、感謝の気持ちが一番大きいが。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.
ModelAnswer:
[Kaisho]: "I should be the one who's more efficient, but Fraise is almost quicker."
[Fraise]: "Kaisho-san is so meticulous about details. I want to learn from you."
[Kaisho]: "Really?"
[Fraise]: "Sometimes, you space out..."
[Kaisho]: "...Ugh..."
[Fraise]: "You must be worried and have a lot on your mind... You're probably thinking hard right now..."
[Fraise]: "I heard a little about what's going on from the pastry chef."
[Kaisho]: "It doesn't give me any reason to space out during work, though."
[Fraise]: "Then I'll pick up the slack for you."
[Kaisho]: "...What should I say...?"  

(Sorry-like, pathetic-like. Of course, gratitude is the biggest feeling.)

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「フレーズはすごく小さい仔ネコだったし、ほんの短い間だったから、覚えてないと思うけど」

[フレーズ]: 「あ、あの……」
[嘉祥]: 「ん？」
[フレーズ]: 「実は……覚えています……嘉祥さんが、ここに住んでいたこと」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、そうだったのかい！？」

[嘉祥]: 「言ってくれればよかったのに」

[フレーズ]: 「覚えてる、だけですから」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「...What is the matter?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no. Just a little trip down memory lane.」
[Kashou]: 「Actually, I lived together with you, Fraise, albeit for just a short while.」
[Kashou]: 「You were a super small kitten back then, and it was a really short time, so I don't think you remember.」
[Kashou]: 「You've been smart ever since you were a kid.」
[Fraise]: 「U-Um...」
[Kashou]: 「Hm?」
[Fraise]: 「Actually... I do remember... I remember that you used to live here.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Wait, you do?!」
[Fraise]: 「I'm sorry. I realized right when we met, but...」
[Kashou]: 「Dang, you should have told me.」
[Fraise]: 「Well, you seemed to have more pressing matters to attend to...」
[Fraise]: 「I just remember; that's all.」
ModelAnswer:
**Fraise:** "...What's wrong?"  
**Kashou:** "No... I was just thinking about something from a while back."  
**Kashou:** "Actually, for a short time, I lived with Fraise."  
**Kashou:** "You were such a tiny kitten, and it was only for a brief period, so you probably don't remember."  
**Kashou:** "But you've always been a smart little one."  
**Fraise:** "Ah... um..."  
**Kashou:** "Hm?"  
**Fraise:** "Actually... I do remember... that you used to live here."  
**Kashou:** "Oh, really!?"  
**Fraise:** "I'm sorry. It just clicked when we met..."  
**Kashou:** "You should have said something sooner."  
**Fraise:** "It seems like Master has some important business..."  
**Fraise:** "That's all I remember."

[Fraise]: 「I've always looked up to you... and helped out in the shop because of that.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, once she became the catgirl here, she would always say she wanted to help out around shop and even made her name Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「If memory serves, a catgirl picks their name when they're three months old, so that's when she came here, huh?」

[Kashou]: 「Yeah, of course. Thank you so much for remembering, Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, I appreciate you helping out Mentor in such big ways as well.」
ModelAnswer:
[Fraise]: "I admired my older brother so much... I used to help out at his shop."  
[Beignet]: "So you became the cat here and started saying you wanted to keep helping, even changing your name to Fraise?"  
[Kashou]: "I believe cats are named around three months old. So that's where it came from..."  
[Fraise]: "Right now, my older brother is going through a tough time... I thought he wouldn't want to hear about me anymore."  
[Fraise]: "But then... when I finally got to eat the macaron I'd always dreamed of... I just couldn't resist!"  
[Shigure]: "It's okay, Fraise. He'll understand if you don't hold back so much."  
[Kashou]: "Ah, yeah, of course. Thanks for remembering that, Fraise."  
[Kashou]: "And thanks too, Master. For helping out so much."

[Kashou]: 「Don't talk like you didn't start it.」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies. I never thought that it would prove this effective.」
[Fraise]: 「Shigure-san... I think you may have overdid it.」

[Shigure]: 「You have become the hot topic yourself. Look! Right here, see?」
Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.
There are even some customers stating they're explicitly coming to see her. Most likely standing in that line outside the shop...

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」

食後――テーブルには、珈琲が並んでいる。
[ベニエ]: 「今日は、大盛況だったわね」
[フレーズ]: 「本当に、そうです。あんなにお客さんが来るなんて……」
reference_answer:

[Beignet]: 「Hehe... I hope you enjoy the meal.」
[Shigure]: 「I will!」
[Fraise]: 「Your cooking is always amazing, Pâtissière, but with Onii-san and Shigure-san around, you go the extra mile.」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... I just can't help myself.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
Just like last night, we have a spectacular dinner.
After the meal — cups of coffee line the table.

**Beignet:** "Hehe… I get a little too enthusiastic."  
**Kashou:** "Thank you very much."  

As last night, it was an absolutely wonderful dinner.  
After the meal—the table is set with coffee.

**Fraise:** "It really was. So many customers… I can't believe it."

Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "There's no mistake. So many people researched it because of the topic, and the consensus was that it was a renowned establishment. It’s synergy."  
[Kashou]: "For me, I'm just happy more people know about Master's amazing cakes."  
[Fraise]: "Ugh… If this keeps up tomorrow, things might get a little rough."  
[Beignet]: "Today must have been special."  
[Beignet]: "I don't think there'll be lines like this again tomorrow."  
[Fraise]: "That's right… Tomorrow will just be the pastry chef and me again."  

We were supposed to leave tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is seven hours. To get home within the promised three days, we need that much time out of it.  
In the end, I still don't know what I'm lacking in myself.  
But emotionally, things have gotten a lot easier…

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「あ、すみません……」
[ベニエ]: 「結局、お役に立てなかったわね」
[嘉祥]: 「いや、そんなことは！」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……まぁ……まだ、父親の言う芯ってのは、よくわかっていません」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、この場所へ来て、お店を手伝って、思い出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、やっぱり、皆を笑顔にするケーキが作りたい」
[嘉祥]: 「師匠の作るケーキは、本当に美味しくて、優しい味で……皆を笑顔にしてくれるんです」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがとう。そう言ってもらえて、嬉しいわ」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は、なんだか、いろいろと考えすぎて……最初の気持ちを忘れていたというか……」
[嘉祥]: 「口では目指していると言いつつ、別のことに捕らわれていたように思います」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」
[Beignet]: 「Looks like I wasn't able to help after all.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's not true!」
[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」
[Beignet]: 「...Thank you. It warms my heart to hear you say that.」
[Kashou]: 「It's sort of like I've been thinking of so much... I've lost sight of my initial focus...」
[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashō]: "Ah, sorry…"  
[Beignet]: "In the end, I couldn't help you."  
[Kashō]: "No, that's not it!"  
[Kashō]: "Ah… well… I still don't really understand what my father meant by 'core.'"  
[Kashō]: "But coming here and helping out at the shop reminded me."  
[Kashō]: "I want to make cakes that will make everyone smile."  
[Kashō]: "Your cakes are truly delicious, with such a gentle flavor… they make everyone happy."  
[Beignet]: "...Thank you. I'm glad to hear you say that."  
[Kashō]: "I guess I was thinking too much about things… I forgot my original feeling…"  
[Kashō]: "Even though I kept saying what I aimed for, I think I got caught up in something else."

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「前にも言ったとおり、嘉祥のお父さんの真意はわからないけれど、私は貴方のことを応援しているわ」
[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」

[嘉祥]: 「それなら、パティシエールになった理由は、どうなんでしょうか？」
[ベニエ]: 「……この店は……私の祖母の代からのもので、ずっとケーキを作ってきたの」
[ベニエ]: 「嘉祥の家ほどではないけれど、守るべき伝統があると思っているわ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:
**Beignet:** "As I said before, I don't know the true intentions of your father, Kashou, but I'm rooting for you."  
**Kashou:** "Thank you."  
**Kashou:** "Speaking of which, I've told you many times why I make cakes... but have you ever heard about Master?"  
**Beignet:** "...Not really."  
**Kashou:** "Well, the last time I asked, he just said it was because I'm a pastry chef..."  
**Beignet:** "Hehe… Is that so?"  
**Kashou:** "If that's the case, what made you become a pastry chef in the first place?"  
**Beignet:** "...This shop... has been in my grandmother's family for generations. We've always made cakes."  
**Beignet:** "I think there are traditions to uphold, even if not as much as your family does."

Question:

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hm? Huh? I... did say that my family owned a Japanese pastry shop, but did I ever mention that they had a history?」
I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...
[Beignet]: 「Well...」
[Shigure]: 「My apologies, Nii-sama! I told her this morning!」
[Kashou]: 「Huh?」

[Kashou]: 「No, it's all good. I wasn't trying to keep it a secret.」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... Shigure told me about your situation.」
[Kashou]: 「So, that's how you know. Oh, I'm sorry for cutting you off. You were saying something about the tradition of La Soleil?」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashō]: "Huh? Wait, I... did I mention that my family's sweets shop is an old-established one when I said it was a wagashi house?"  
I'd been avoiding mentioning how long our family’s confectionery shop has been around since I’m apprenticing to learn Western sweets.  

[Beignet]: "That..."  

[Shigure]: "I'm sorry, Master! It's just that this morning—"  

[Kashō]: "Huh?"  

[Shigure]: "I thought you should know about the situation with your brother. I shouldn’t have been so presumptuous..."  

[Kashō]: "No, it’s fine. I wasn’t hiding anything."  

[Beignet]: "Oh... Shigure told me everything."  

[Kashō]: "So that's how it was. Ah, sorry for the tangent. So, you were saying about this La Soleil having traditions?"

[ベニエ]: 「でも、私は日本を去らなければならなくなったの」
[ベニエ]: 「この店を継ぐ予定だった兄が、早世してしまって……」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「We married, and I gave birth to a son... For a while, the three of us lived together.」
[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」
ModelAnswer:
**Beignet:** "We got married, and a son was born… for a while, the three of us lived together."  
**Beignet:** "Around that time… my son said that the sweets I made would make everyone happy."  
**Beignet:** "My son told me, 'Mommy is like the sun.'"  
**Beignet:** "That's why I named this shop La Soleil – because of those words."  
**Kashō:** "I see… so that’s how it came to be…"  
Finally hearing the origin story of La Soleil made me happy. But it didn’t seem to be just a happy tale.  
**Shigure:** "...You loved your son… and your family, didn't you?"  
**Beignet:** "Yes, I did."  
**Beignet:** "But I had to leave Japan."  
**Beignet:** "My brother, who was supposed to take over this shop, passed away prematurely…"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そんなことがあったなんて……」
[ベニエ]: 「あの頃の私は、まだ若くて、賢明ではなかったわね。いくつものことを追いかけて……」
[ベニエ]: 「失ったあとに、何が一番大切だったのか、気付いたもの」
[フレーズ]: 「家族が……一番だったのですか？」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね……私にとっての、お菓子は……息子が笑顔になってくれるものだった」
[ベニエ]: 「私が作っているお菓子は、幼い息子が美味しいと褒めてくれた味なのよ」
[ベニエ]: 「今も作り続けているのは、いつかまた息子が食べて喜んでくれるかもしれない、と思って」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう、未練なのよ」
[嘉祥]: 「あの……ご家族は、今は……？」
下宿させてもらって、毎日のように店を手伝っていたが、電話も郵便も、家族らしき者から連絡が来たことはなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I can't believe that's what happened...」
[Beignet]: 「I was still young back then and not wise. I tried chasing after a lot of things...」
[Beignet]: 「After I lost it all, I realized what was truly precious to me.」
[Fraise]: 「Was it... family?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... To me, my pastries were always... something that brought a smile to my son's face.」
[Beignet]: 「The pastries I make are imbued with the flavor that my young son complimented me for.」
[Beignet]: 「I think that I still make them to this day on the off-chance that my son might eat them in joy one day.」
[Beignet]: 「...That is the regret I speak of.」
[Kashou]: 「Um... Where is your family now...?」
I lodged here with Mentor's permission and helped in the shop each day, but I don't remember a single phone call, package, or message from anyone even resembling family.
ModelAnswer:
[Kaisho]: "That something like that happened..."  
[Benie]: "Back then, I was young and not very wise. I chased after so many things..."  
[Benie]: "Only after losing them did I realize what was truly important."  
[Fleuret]: "Was it... your family?"  
[Benie]: "Yes… for me, sweets were… something that made my son smile."  
[Benie]: "The taste of the sweets I make is one my young son praised as delicious."  
[Benie]: "I keep making them now because someday my son might eat them and be happy again."  
[Benie]: "...It's just a lingering attachment, you see."  
[Kaisho]: "Um… are your family still…?"  
I let him stay in my lodgings, helping out at the shop almost every day, but I never received any calls or letters from anyone who seemed to be related.

metadata:
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「歳を取ってから、ようやく息子の気持ちを考えることができるようになったなんてね……」
[嘉祥]: 「気持ちを考える……」
[時雨]: 「何歳になろうと、私は母様と会いたいと思っています」
[フレーズ]: 「歳なんて関係ないと思います、パティシエール」
[嘉祥]: 「俺は……やっぱり、当時の師匠が、ただ失敗したとは思えません」
[嘉祥]: 「だって、もしも師匠が日本に残って、この街でパティスリーを再開していなかったら、俺は素晴らしい洋菓子に出会えなかった」
[ベニエ]: 「……そういう考え方もあるわね」
[フレーズ]: 「わ、わたしもです！　パティシエールがいなかったら、今頃は……」
[ベニエ]: 「そうね。フレーズには出会えなかったかもしれない」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「To think that I finally managed to consider my son's feelings after growing old...」
[Kashou]: 「Considering his feelings...」
[Shigure]: 「No matter how old I would get, I would want to meet my mother.」
[Fraise]: 「I don't think age matters here, Pâtissière.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I... couldn't consider what you did at the time as a mistake.」
[Kashou]: 「I mean, if you had remained in Japan and hadn't resumed business as a patissiere here, I wouldn't have ever encountered such wonderful Western pastries.」
[Beignet]: 「...I suppose that is one way of thinking about it.」
[Fraise]: 「I-I agree! If you weren't around, Pâtissière, then we wouldn't...」
[Beignet]: 「That's true. We probably wouldn't have ever met.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "It's only now, as I've grown older, that I can finally understand my son's feelings..."
[Kaisho]: "Understand his feelings..."
[Shigure]: "No matter how old I get, I want to see Mother."
[Fraise]: "Age doesn't matter at all, Chef."
[Kaisho]: "I... still don't think it was just a failure on the Master's part back then."
[Kaisho]: "Because if the Master hadn't stayed in Japan and reopened his patisserie here, I wouldn't have met such wonderful Western sweets."
[Beignet]: "...So that's how you see it..."
[Fraise]: "Me too! If there wasn't a Chef... I'd probably be..."  
[Beignet]: "That's right. You might never have met Fraise."

metadata:
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Fraise (フレーズ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「だって、あんなにも大勢のお客さんが、笑顔になっていたじゃありませんか」
[ベニエ]: 「……ありがたいことにね」
[嘉祥]: 「昔の師匠が失敗したとは思えません。でも、息子さんの気持ちを考えてあげられなかったというのも事実なんだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「だけど、息子さんが大人になっているなら、師匠の気持ちだって考えてくれるんじゃないか、って」
[ベニエ]: 「それは、私にとって都合のいい空想ではなくて？」
[嘉祥]: 「かもしれません。でも、わからないことです。だから、俺は……息子さんに会ってみるべきだと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「勝手なことを言って、すみません」
[フレーズ]: 「わたしも、お兄さんと同じように思います、パティシエール」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「After all, that huge crowd of people had smiles on each of their faces, did they not?」
[Beignet]: 「...Yes, thankfully.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think  what you did in the past was a mistake, but I do think it's a fact that you couldn't take your son's feelings into consideration at the time.」
[Kashou]: 「Still, if your son is an adult now, I'm pretty sure that he's considering how you must've felt, too.」
[Beignet]: 「Isn't that just convenient wishful thinking?」
[Kashou]: 「Perhaps, but nothing is certain, which is why... I think you should give your son a visit.」
[Kashou]: 「I apologize for speaking outside my boundaries.」
[Fraise]: 「My opinion is the same as Onii-san's, Pâtissière.」
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Because, weren't so many customers smiling?"  
[Bénié]: "...That's a blessing."  
[Kaishō]: "I don't think your old mentor would have failed. But I also believe he couldn't consider his son's feelings."  
[Kaishō]: "But if your son has grown up, maybe he'll understand what the master was thinking too?"  
[Bénié]: "Isn't that just wishful thinking for me?"  
[Kaishō]: "Maybe. But I don't know. So... I think I should meet my son."  
[Kaishō]: "Sorry for saying something so presumptuous."  
[Fraise]: "I agree with you, Onii-san, as a patissière."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Beignet (ベニエ) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Mentor (師匠)
Question:
[ベニエ]: 「もう一度、考えてみるわね？」
[嘉祥]: 「……すみません、師匠。悲しい話をさせてしまいました」
[ベニエ]: 「いえ……いつかは、話しておいたほうがいいと思っていたから」
[ベニエ]: 「貴方は道を間違えないと思うわ、嘉祥」
[嘉祥]: 「俺が、道を？　……そうだと、いいのですが」
師匠は家族と離ればなれになったことを後悔している。
俺は自分から家を出て、両親とは疎遠になっていた。
母親の誕生日に言い争いをしたっきり、一度も連絡すら取っていない。
すでに道を間違えているような気がしなくもないが……
[ベニエ]: 「今の嘉祥には、パティシエとしての実力だけじゃなく、とても大切なものが身についているもの」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「But, I'll try thinking it over again, okay?」
[Kashou]: 「...Forgive me, Mentor. I didn't mean to make you tell such a sad tale.」
[Beignet]: 「No, I had been thinking I should talk about it eventually anyway.」
[Beignet]: 「I know you're on the right path, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Me? On the right path? Well, I'd... certainly like to think so.」
Mentor regrets the fact that she was separated from her family.
I left my house voluntarily and became estranged from my parents.
Ever since that verbal spat I had on my mom's birthday, I haven't gotten in contact with them even once.
I'd say it definitely feels as though I'm on the wrong path, but...
[Beignet]: 「Right now, you have not only mastered the skills of a capable pâtissièr, but something else very important.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "Let's think about it again, shall we?"  
[Kaishou]: "...Sorry, Master. I made you listen to a sad story."  
[Beignet]: "No... I thought it was better to talk about it sooner or later."  
[Beignet]: "I believe you won't stray from the path, Kaishou."  
[Kaishou]: "Me? From the path... I hope so."  

The Master regrets being separated from his family.  
I left home on my own and distanced myself from my parents.  
We had a fight on Mother's birthday, and we haven't spoken since—not even to say hello.  
I can’t help but feel like I’ve already gone astray…  

[Beignet]: "What you have now as a pastry chef isn't just skill; it’s something very precious."

Question:
[ベニエ]: 「そうね。ここで働いていた頃には、欠けていたかもしれないわね」

[嘉祥]: 「俺の周りの……」
時雨を見つめる。
そして、俺はネコたちのことを思い出した。
[ベニエ]: 「今の貴方になら、きっと出来るわ」
[ベニエ]: 「気をつけて帰りなさい、嘉祥」
[嘉祥]: 「はい、それはもう」

[時雨]: 「私も、すごく貴重な経験をさせていただき、とても楽しかったです」
[フレーズ]: 「お兄さん……いろいろと、ありがとうございました」
[嘉祥]: 「俺のほうこそ、世話になったね、フレーズ」
reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Correct, you might have been missing it back when you were still working here.」
[Beignet]: 「No doubt it was nurtured by those you keep around you.」
[Kashou]: 「Those I keep around me...」
I stare at Shigure.
Then, I start to think about the girls.
[Beignet]: 「As you are now, I'm sure you'll do fine.」
[Beignet]: 「Have a safe trip back home, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Yes, of course.」
[Beignet]: 「Shigure, I'm so glad you came along.」
[Shigure]: 「As am I. It was an invaluable experience that I thoroughly enjoyed.」
[Fraise]: 「Onii-san... Thank you so much for everything.」
[Kashou]: 「I should be the one thanking you for the hospitality, Fraise.」
ModelAnswer:
[Beignet]: "I see. When I was working here, you might have been missing."  
[Beignet]: "You were probably nurtured by the people around you."  
[Kaishou]: "The people…around me…"  
He looks at Shigure. Then he remembers the cats.  
[Beignet]: "With your current self, I'm sure you can do it."  
[Beignet]: "Take care on your way home, Kaishou."  
[Kaishou]: "Yes, well…"  
[Beignet]: "Shigure, thank you so much for coming."  
[Shigure]: "I had a very valuable experience and enjoyed myself immensely."  
[Fraise]: "Big brother…thank you very much for everything."  
[Kaishou]: "You're the one who took care of me, Fraise."

フレーズが封筒を受け取り、中を確かめる。
入っていたのは、旅行券だった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Hmm... It's hard to describe in words, but... I guess you could say I found what the words 'putting smiles on people's faces' really means.」

[Fraise]: 「I don't quite understand, but I'm sure it's something important.」

[Fraise]: 「What is this?」

Fraise takes the envelope and checks the contents.

**時雨:** "A gift from me."  

Fraise takes the envelope and checks inside. Inside was a travel voucher.

metadata:

Question:

[時雨]: 「はい、必ず……」

[時雨]: 「日本に来てくれたら、いいのですが」

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「U-Um, Beignet-san... Thank you for your hospitality.」
[Beignet]: 「Will you be making another visit, too, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Yes, absolutely.」
[Shigure]: 「I promise you, I'll be back!」
[Beignet]: 「Yes... I look forward to your return...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes! Yes! I'll be back...-sama. To eat your cake.」
[Beignet]: 「...! Thank you, Shigure.」
[Shigure]: 「Fraise sure was a wonderful catgirl.」
[Kashou]: 「She sure was.」
[Shigure]: 「I wish she would come to Japan.」
[Kashou]: 「I can't imagine my mentor closing the shop for an extended period of time, but yeah, it'd be nice if they could come for even a few days.」

ModelAnswer:

**Beignet:** "Shigure, will you come again?"  
**Shigure:** "Yes, definitely…"  
**Shigure:** "I'll definitely come again!"  
**Beignet:** "Looking forward to it… looking forward to it…"  
**Shigure:** "Yes! Yes! I’ll come again… to eat your cake, Master."  
**Beignet:** "...Thank you, Shigure."  
**Shigure:** "Fraise was a lovely cat."  
**Kashou:** "Yeah, she was."  
**Shigure:** "I wish he could have stayed in Japan."  
**Kashou:** "I doubt Master would take that long off… but even just a few days would be nice."  
**Shigure:** "I’m sure I’d get along with your other cats too."  

*(Note: The honorific "-san" is preserved for Kashou, and "Master" (ご主人さま) is kept as-is. Onomatopoeia like "doki doki" isn't present in this script, so no translation is needed.)*

metadata:

Question:

[時雨]: 「女性は身だしなみに小道具がいっぱい必要なのです」
[時雨]: 「あと、このドレスと和服とで、同じ靴、同じ下着というわけにはいきませんし、部屋着も必要でしたし」

[嘉祥]: 「あー……フランスの宅配便は、あまり頼りにしないほうがいいかな」
[時雨]: 「そ、そうなんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「個人的な経験によるが……運に左右されると思うぞ」
[時雨]: 「それは困ります……」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Heave...」
Shigure pulls her rather big carry-on case. Looks pretty heavy.
[Kashou]: 「This was a two-night trip by plane, which means it was roughly a one-night stay. You're packing quite the load for such a short time.」
[Shigure]: 「A girl needs many tools to keep up appearances.」
[Shigure]: 「Also, I couldn't just use the same shoes and underwear for this dress and kimono. I also needed loungewear, as well.」
[Shigure]: 「And I didn't research on how to use the French luggage delivery services.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, I wouldn't put too much faith in getting your luggage delivered to the airport in France.」
[Shigure]: 「O-Oh, is that so?」
[Kashou]: 「Coming from personal experience... you're pretty much leaving it to chance.」
[Shigure]: 「Well, that sounds no good.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Ugh..."  
Shigure is pulling a large suitcase. It looks pretty heavy.  

**Kashou:** "This time we're flying for two nights, so it's basically a one-night trip? That's quite the luggage."  
**Shigure:** "Women need lots of accessories for appearances!"  
**Shigure:** "Plus, I can't wear the same shoes or underwear with this dress and kimono, and I needed loungewear too!"  
**Shigure:** "I hadn't researched how French delivery services work..."  

**Kashou:** "Ah... maybe it's best not to rely on French delivery services."  
**Shigure:** "R-really?"  
**Kashou:** "Just my personal experience, but… I think they're heavily influenced by luck."  
**Shigure:** "That's a problem..."

metadata:

Question:

[時雨]: 「兄様、ちょっと変わりましたね……」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、重たい荷物を運んでいる妹を気遣うくらい、今までだってしただろ？」
[嘉祥]: 「そんなに薄情な人間ではなかったと思うぞ。むしろ、お節介なくらいで……」
[時雨]: 「はい。今も昔も、兄様はとっても優しくて、素敵です」
[時雨]: 「でも、以前なら、私の言葉を待つことなく、重そうだから持ってあげるよと言うかと思います」
[嘉祥]: 「そう、かな……？」
[時雨]: 「それはそれで、とても嬉しいことですし、私は感謝したと思いますが」
[時雨]: 「でも、今の兄様は、私に判断を任せてくれました」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Shigure, I can take that for you if it's too much, so just ask before you break your back.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh...」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, I think you've changed a bit...」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? Looking out for my little sister carrying a bunch of heavy luggage isn't something new for me, is it?」
[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」
[Shigure]: 「That being the case, it's an extremely kind gesture, and I would appreciate it.」
[Shigure]: 「However, you seem to let me make the decision for myself now.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashō]: "Shigure, if it's too much, I'll carry it for you. Just tell me before you push yourself too hard."  
[Shigure]: "Ah…"  
[Shigure]: "Brother… you've changed a little, haven't you?"  
[Kashō]: "Huh? Haven't I always been concerned about my sister carrying heavy things?"  
[Kashō]: "I don't think you were ever that uncaring. If anything, you were the type to be too helpful…"  
[Shigure]: "Yes. Even now and then, Brother is so kind and wonderful."  
[Shigure]: "But before, if I looked like it was heavy, you'd offer to carry it without waiting for me to say anything."  
[Kashō]: "Oh? Really?"  
[Shigure]: "That made me very happy back then, and I think I appreciated it."  
[Shigure]: "But now, Brother lets me make the decision myself."

Question:

ネコたちと過ごした日々があって、師匠の言葉があって、今の俺が形作られているのだろう。

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「You probably don't realize it yourself since it's such a minor change. If I weren't such a Nii-sama fanatic, I would have overlooked it myself.」
[Kashou]: 「U-Uh, sure...」
Not sure how I feel about my sister being able to pick up on something about me better than... well, me.
[Shigure]: 「I'm sure that the past few days alone haven't changed you... but rather, the culmination of the days leading up until now have.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't really think I've changed any, but maybe I did if you say so.」
The days I spent with the girls, my mentor's words— all those things have probably helped shape the person I am now.
[Kashou]: 「Well, Mentor was willing to share that much of her story with me. I could learn a thing or two myself.」
[Shigure]: 「Were you able to learn anything?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I think. I tried thinking of my own reasons for pastry-making.」
ModelAnswer:

**Kashou:** "O-okay..."  
It feels weird that my own brother is more aware of himself than I am...  
**Shigure:** "Not just the last few days... but surely, the accumulation of past days has changed you."  
**Kashou:** "I don't think I've changed at all, but if Shigure says so, maybe I have."  
Days spent with the cats, your words, they're shaping who I am now.  
**Kashou:** "Well, Master told me that much. I guess I learned something too."  
**Shigure:** "Did you learn anything?"  
**Kashou:** "Probably. I thought about why I make Western sweets."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「それが言葉だけだったんじゃないか、と思ってな」

[嘉祥]: 「いや、本当の心の奥底にある理由を……俺は自分自身の気持ちを、深く考えてみたんだ」
[嘉祥]: 「結局のところ、俺は……親父に認められたいんだ」

[嘉祥]: 「俺は、承認欲求に満ちたエゴイストなんだろう、きっと」
[嘉祥]: 「すまないな、時雨……幻滅させたかな……？」

[嘉祥]: 「そうじゃなければ、親父に否定されたくらいで、こんなにも悩んだりはしないだろう」
[時雨]: 「もしかしたら、そういう気持ちはあるのかもしれません」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm starting to think those were just words.」
[Shigure]: 「No way! No way they're just words...」
[Kashou]: 「No, I mean the real reason deep in my heart... I tried giving my own feelings some deep thought.」
[Kashou]: 「Ultimately, I... just want dad to approve of me.」
[Kashou]: 「A little too old to be going through my rebellious teenager phase, I know.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm pretty sure I'm being egotistical and trying to seek approval.」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry, Shigure. Did I shatter your illusion of me...?」
[Shigure]: 「Is that your reason for making pastries, Nii-sama?」
[Kashou]: 「If it wasn't, I wouldn't be this broken up about dad disapproving of me.」
[Shigure]: 「That could very well play a part in it, yes.」
ModelAnswer:
**Kashō:** "I was wondering if it was just words."  
**Shigure:** "No way! It couldn't have been just words..."  
**Kashō:** "Well, I really thought about the reason deep down in my heart... I seriously considered my own feelings."  
**Kashō:** "In the end, what I want is... to be recognized by my father."  
**Kashō:** "Am I still acting rebellious at this age?"  
**Kashō:** "I'm probably just an egotistical narcissist full of a need for approval."  
**Kashō:** "Sorry, Shigure… Did I disappoint you…?"  
**Shigure:** "So that's why you make Western sweets?"  
**Kashō:** "If it wasn't, I wouldn't have worried so much just because my father disapproved."  
**Shigure:** "Maybe there is a little of that in you."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……けっこう遅くなったな」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。夕食には戻れるかと思っていたのですが」
飛行機の到着がやや遅れ、俺たちは夜になって帰宅した。
まだネコたちが店にいるだろうから、と時雨も水無月家ではなく、俺と一緒にラ・ソレイユへ。
[嘉祥]: 「さすがにこの行脚はキツかったな」
しかも、向こうでは立ち仕事が多かった。
[時雨]: 「私は、ぜんぜん大丈夫です。　お気遣いは無用です、兄様」
気丈に笑みを浮かべるが、疲労の色は隠せない。
[嘉祥]: 「ウチで休んでいくといい。　なんなら泊まって、明日帰ってもいいし」
[時雨]: 「お泊まりですか！？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Phew... It sure got late.」
[Shigure]: 「That it did. I thought that we could make it back in time for dinner.」
My plane landed somewhat late, so I end up home around nighttime.
Figuring that the catgirls would be at the shop, Shigure comes with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki house.
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I guess the trek over was asking a lot.」
Plus, we did so much work on our feet overseas.
[Shigure]: 「I'm perfectly fine. You needn't worry about me, Nii-sama.」
Shigure gives a firm smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.
[Kashou]: 「You can rest up at my house. You can also stay over and go back home tomorrow, if you want.」
[Shigure]: 「Stay over?!」
ModelAnswer:
[Minaduki Kashou]: "Phew… it got pretty late."  
[Minaduki Shigure]: "Yes, it did. I was hoping to be back for dinner."  

The flight was a bit delayed, so we didn't get home until nightfall.  
Shigure figured the cats would still be at the shop, so she came with me instead of going straight home.  

[Minaduki Kashou]: "This walking tour was rough."  
Especially since I had to stand all day over there.  

[Minaduki Shigure]: "I'm perfectly fine! No need to worry about me, Brother."  
She forced a cheerful smile, but the exhaustion was clear in her eyes.  

[Minaduki Kashou]: "You can stay at my place if you want. You could even sleep over and head home tomorrow."  

[Minaduki Shigure]: "Sleep over!?!"

[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
今夜のクリスマス・パーティーのために作ったケーキだ。
父親は何と言うだろうか？
俺は不思議な高揚感に包まれていた。
[一同]: 「メリー・クリスマスにゃ！メリ……クリメリー・クリスマスーメリー・クリスマス♪メリー・クリスマスです～♪メリー・クリスマスッ！！メリー・クリスマス」
[淡雪]: 「めりーくりすます」
[嘉祥]: 「って……親父は、どこいった？」
まさか、今回は顔を合わすこともしないつもりか？
[淡雪]: 「ふふ……心配しなくても、ちょっとしたら帰ってくるわ」
[淡雪]: 「町内会の呑み会に、差し入れに行っているだけだから」
[時雨]: 「それ、帰れなくなるのでは……？」
[淡雪]: 「最近はそういうの、無理に呑ませたり、付き合わせたりするのは、ダメらしいから」
reference_answer:
This is the cake I've made for tonight's Christmas party.
I wonder what dad will say about it?
I feel a strange sense of exhilaration coursing through me.
[Everyone]: 「Meowry Christmas!!Merry... Xmas.Merry Christmas!Merry Christmas♪Merry Christmas~♪Merry Christmas!!Merry Christmas!」
[Awayuki]: 「Merry Christmas!」
[Kashou]: 「Oh... Where did Dad go off to?」
Don't tell me he doesn't plan to show his face tonight?
[Awayuki]: 「Tee hee... No need to worry. He'll be back shortly.」
[Awayuki]: 「He's just going to the neighborhood association's drinking party to provide refreshments.」
[Shigure]: 「Isn't that the thing he doesn't come back home from...?」
[Awayuki]: 「As of late, it seems they're not allowed to do things like that—forcing people to drink, party along with them, things of that nature.」
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "This is the cake I made for tonight's Christmas party."  
**Shigure:** "I wonder what Father will say?"  
*I was enveloped in a strange sense of excitement.*  

[Everyone]: *"Merry Christmas! Me... Merry Christmeeray Christmas♪ Merry Christmas~♪ Merry Christmas!! Merry Christmas!"*  

[Awayuki]: *"Me-ri-christmas."*  

[Kashou]: "That… where did Father go?"  
*I doubt he'll even show his face this time.*  

[Awayuki]: *"Hehe… Don't worry, he'll be back soon."*  
[Awayuki]: *"He's just going to the neighborhood association drinking party with a gift."*  
**Shigure:** "That might make him disappear for good…"  
[Awayuki]: "Lately, it seems forcing him to drink or drag him along is frowned upon."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「そういえば、時雨が勝手にフランスに行ったことは、ちゃんと許してもらえたの？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～、置き手紙１つだったから、お母さん怒ってましたよね～？」
[淡雪]: 「そうねー。相談もなしに急に行っちゃうものだから、心配したわー」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ありませんでした……」
[淡雪]: 「でもまぁ、嘉祥が一緒だったみたいだし」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も驚いたけどな」
[淡雪]: 「お土産のフィナンシェが美味しかったから許したわ♪」
母親は怒ると海より深く静かに怒るタイプだが、美味しい食べ物で、だいたい何でも許してくれるのだった。
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「That reminds me, did he ever forgive you for just up and going to France, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: "Come to think of it, did you get permission for going to France on your own, Shigure?"  
[Shigure]: "Ugh..."  
[Cinnamon]: "Ah~, Mom was mad because there wasn't even a note~?"  
[Dawn Snow]: "That's right. You went without telling anyone, so she worried."  
[Shigure]: "I'm sorry..."  
[Dawn Snow]: "But well, it seems Kasha was with you."  
[Kasha]: "Yeah, I was surprised too."  
[Dawn Snow]: "The financiers were delicious, so I forgave her ♪"  

Mother gets angrier than the ocean when she's mad, but if there's good food involved, she'll forgive pretty much anything.

metadata:
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[淡雪]: 「ええ、フランスのラ・ソレイユっていうお店の」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、師匠の焼き菓子をお土産にしてたのか！？」
[アズキ]: 「時雨ー！？」
[時雨]: 「じ、実はキャリーケースに１箱しか入らなかったんです！」
[時雨]: 「ネコたちのぶんは、兄様が作ってくださいますよ。　そうですよね？」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……ああ……同じように作れるかなぁ……？」
[ショコラ]: 「お師匠さまのフィナンシェは、ご主人さまのと味が違うんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだな。そもそも、使っている材料も違うし」
全ての材料をフランスから取り寄せていたら、超高級店みたいな価格設定になってしまう。
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「Yes, from a shop called 'La Soleil' in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? You gave her my mentor's baked goods as a souvenir?!」
[Azuki]: 「Shigure?!」
[Shigure]: 「Th-The truth is... I could only fit one box in my carry-on case!」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama will make all the catgirls's portions. Isn't that right?」
[Kashou]: 「S-Sure... Can I even make it the same, though...?」
[Chocola]: 「Is your mentor's financier different in taste than yours, Master?」
[Kashou]: 「It is. Right down to the ingredients we use.」
If I were to get all my ingredients from France, we'd have to have some super high-class patisserie prices to recoup.
ModelAnswer:
**淡雪:** "Yeah, from a place called La Soleil in France."  
**嘉祥:** "Eh? So you brought back your master’s pastries as souvenirs!?"  
**アズキ:** "Shigure!?!"  
**時雨:** "W-well, actually, I only managed to fit one box in my carry-on!"  
**時雨:** "My brother will make some for the cats. Right?"  
**嘉祥:** "Ah… ah… can you make something similar…?"  
**ショコラ:** "Does your master’s financiers taste different from Master's?"  
**嘉祥:** "That’s right. The ingredients are different in the first place."  
If I ordered all the materials from France, it would be way too expensive like a high-end shop.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
**Shigure:** "Whoa, a Christmas present!? Thank you so much, Mother!"  
**Awayuki:** "It might be a little early, but Kasha might get mad and come home again, right?"  
**Shigure:** "...Ugh..."  
**Kashou:** "N-no, it's not like that today! I'm trusting you."  
**Awayuki:** "Yes, even you too, Kasha."  
**Kashou:** "Ah, yeah... thanks."  
**Awayuki:** "Try opening it?"  

As told, she took off the wrapping paper and opened the small box.  
**Kashou:** "...A photo frame?"  
It seems there's no picture inside.  
**Awayuki:** "I thought you could hang one of your memories from this year in your room—it might be fun."  
Come to think of it, she remembers Shigure giving Awayuki a present on her birthday because their mother wanted one.

metadata:
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」
[バニラ]: 「いいね。グッドチョイス。私も、そうする」
[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」
[シナモン]: 「メーちゃんの一番大切な思い出に……わたしも写って……はぁはぁ……うっ」
[メイプル]: 「え？　自分だけ写ってる写真なんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
**Chocola:** "Master! Um, which photo should I use… hmm…"  
**Chocola:** "Ah, let's go with the one from when La Soleil opened. The one taken with you and Vanilla!"  
**Vanilla:** "Good idea. Excellent choice. I'll do that too."  
**Maple:** "What about me?"  
**Cinnamon:** "That’s a good one! When we sang together on the ship!"  
**Cinnamon:** "You even had photos taken, not just video, right~?"  
**Maple:** "Ah…"  
**Maple:** "...Yeah. It's kind of embarrassing."  
**Maple:** "But that was my most precious memory from this past year."  
**Cinnamon:** "If it’s your most precious memory… I want to be in it too… *huff huff* ugh…"  
**Maple:** "Huh? But you're the only one in those photos…"
